quotes.quote: It's not good trying to keep up old friendships. It's painful for both sides. The fact is, one grows out of peple, and the only thing is to face it.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maughan

quotes.quote: An old friend met in a far country is like rain after a drought.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Spend a new penny on an old friend and share an old pleasure with a new friend.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Every murderer is probably somebody’s old friend.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: There’s a thing that keeps surprising you about stormy old friends after they die—their silence. For a while an echo stays in your ear. You hear a laugh, a knowing phrase or two, a certain quality of enunciation. Then, nothing. Another death takes place—voices.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Old friends burn dim, like lamps in noisome air; love them for what they are; nor love them less, because to thee they are not what they were.
quotes.author: Samuel Coleridge Taylor

quotes.quote: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
quotes.author: Duchess of Malfy

quotes.quote: Old friends and old wine are best.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: You know you must be doing something right if old people like you.
quotes.author: Dave Chappelle

quotes.quote: Old people love to give good advice; it compensates them for their inability to set a bad example.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Old people should be heard but not seen. Young people should be seen, not heard.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.quote: Old people at weddings always poke me and say, "You're next." So I started doing that at funerals.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Beautiful young people are accidents of nature, but beautiful old people are works of art.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: When old people speak it is not because of the sweetness of words in our mouths; it is because we see something which you do not see.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Don't hustle old people.
quotes.author: John Burns

quotes.quote: There's one more terrifying fact about old people: I'm going to be one soon.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: What old people say you cannot do, you try and find that you can. Old deeds for old people, and new deeds for new.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how old people are. It matters if they love each other and have fun with each other. It has nothing to do with age. To get old is a mental disease. Everything is in the head.
quotes.author: Nina Hagen

quotes.quote: There are no old people nowadays; they are either 'wonderful for their age' or dead.
quotes.author: Mary Pettibone Poole

quotes.quote: It's not how old you are, it`s how you are old.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Treasure the wisdom of old age. Learn from elder people and be wise.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The young people think that the old people are fools; but the old people know that the young people are fools!
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: It cuts one sadly to see the grief of old people; they've no way o' working it off; and the new spring brings no new shoots out on the withered tree.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The great secret that all old people share is that you really haven't changed in seventy or eighty years. Your body changes, but you don't change at all. And that, of course, causes great confusion.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Our society must make it right and possible for old people not to fear the young or be deserted by them, for the test of a civilization is the way that it cares for its helpless members.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Inside every older person is a younger person wondering what happened.
quotes.author: Jennifer Yane

quotes.quote: Old people's speech is not to be dishonored -- after all, they saw the sun first.
quotes.author: African Proverbs

quotes.quote: What the elders see while sitting the young ones standing on their toes won't see.
quotes.author: African Proverbs

quotes.quote: Old people accustomed to loneliness, though no one expects to spend his or her last years in solitude, absent from loved ones.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: Old people were young people before young people were people.
quotes.author: Tom Wyatt

quotes.quote: Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: A young man is a theory, an old man is a fact.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Older people sit down and ask, 'What is it?' but the boy asks, 'What can I do with it?'.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Old people are often impatient, but for what?
quotes.author: Jonathan Carroll

quotes.quote: Older people, who just happen to have been around longer, may not be cleverer than the young, but they have seen more.
quotes.author: Penelope Keith

quotes.quote: Not until just before dawn do people sleep best; not until people get old do they become wise.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Some people, no matter how old they get, never lose their beauty-they merely move it from their faces into their hearts.
quotes.author: Martin Buxbaum

quotes.quote: After you're older, two things are possibly more important than any others: health and money.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: The Old Testament is the record of men's conviction that God speaks directly to men.
quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

quotes.quote: If you had to summarize the Old Testament, the summary would be: stop doing this to yourselves.
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: The early Church had nothing but the Old Testament. The New Testament lies hidden in the Old; the Old Testament lies open in the New.
quotes.author: Randall Terry

quotes.quote: In the Old Testament, it says that if you have the power to do something good, then you have to do it. You're not to avoid helping somebody in their time of need.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The Old Testament contains fabulous elements. The New Testament consists mostly of teaching, not of narrative at all: but where it is narrative, it is, in my opinion, historical. As to the fabulous element in the Old Testament, I very much doubt if you would be wise to chuck it out.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Nature is God's Old Testament.
quotes.author: Theodore Parker

quotes.quote: The Old Testament gave us the law; the New Testament reveals the love upon which the law rests.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: In some Old Testament books, it's very evident that an editor has been at work. That's quite all right. It's part of the process.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: If someone doesn't know their Old Testament, they don't know right doctrine, right correction, and they can't be equipped for good works.
quotes.author: Randall Terry

quotes.quote: In the Old Testament, we are continually told that our good works are not enough, that God has made a provision. This provision is pointed to at every place in the Old Testament.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: In the Old Testament, God dealt with His people as a nation...Their relationship was completely external. But in the New Covenant, the presence of God moved out of the temple and into our hearts.
quotes.author: John Chisum

quotes.quote: The Old Testament teaches us that if we humble ourselves and pray, God will hear from heaven and heal our land. And the New Testament assures us that the fervent prayers of righteous men can make a difference.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: The negative penalties of the Old Testament case laws were not harsh but just, not a threat to society but rather the necessary judicial foundation of civic freedom… the Old Testament was harsh on criminals because it was soft on victims.
quotes.author: Gary North

quotes.quote: Perhaps the best-known Old Testament example of perseverance is the story of Job.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: The Old Testament is full of poetry, prophecies, chronicles, documentations, storytelling, fairytales.
quotes.author: Amos Oz

quotes.quote: The Old Testament does, in fact, seem to make a distinction between the life of a child and the life of a fetus.
quotes.author: Mark Galli

quotes.quote: First, it is not unimportant that the legislative texts of the Old Testament are placed in the mouth of Moses and within the narrative framework of the sojourn at Sinai.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: Among the Jews, especially in the Old Testament, teachings served not for the communication of religious truth, but rather to bring the one taught into direct confrontation with the Divine Will.
quotes.author: Gordon Fee

quotes.quote: My big brother still thinks he's a better singer than me.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: One can be a brother only in something. Where there is no tie that binds men, men are not united but merely lined up.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other, they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: We came into the world like brother and brother; And now let's go hand in hand, not one before another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We came into the world like brother and brother; And now let's go hand in hand, not one before another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Half the time when brothers wrestle, it's just an excuse to hug each other.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: When brothers agree, no fortress is so strong as their common life.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: The younger brother must help to pay for the pleasures of the elder.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: It takes two men to make one brother.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero.
quotes.author: Marc Brown

quotes.quote: You're a great brother. You give us a heart attack worrying about your heart attack, which you didn't even have the decency to have.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: If thy brother wrongs thee, remember not so much his wrong doing, but more than ever that he is thy brother.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other â€“ they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: There's no buddy like a brother.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Brothers are like streetlights along the road, they don't make distance any shorter but they light up the path and make the walk worthwhile.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no love like the love for a brother. There is no love like the love from a brother.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: After a girl is grown, her little brothers, now her protectors, seem like big brothers.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: There's no other love like the love for a brother. There's no other love like the love from a brother.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Because brothers don't let each other wander in the dark alone.
quotes.author: Jolene Perry

quotes.quote: I had older brothers who would pick on me, and injustice always boiled my blood.
quotes.author: Michelle Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Funny how older brothers could still be annoying even after everyone was all grown-up.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Camden

quotes.quote: As we grew up, my brothers acted like they didn't care, but I always knew they looked out for me and were there!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A brother is a friend given by nature.
quotes.author: Jean-Baptiste Legouve

quotes.quote: A brother is a friend given by nature.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Legouve

quotes.quote: Siblings are the people we practice on, the people who teach us about fairness and cooperation and kindness and caringquite often the hard way.
quotes.author: Pamela Dugdale

quotes.quote: The thing with brothers is, you're supposed to take turns being the keeper. Sometimes you get to sit down and be the brother who is kept.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Nothing can stop me from loving my brother.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.quote: I had older brothers, and I don't think there's anything worse than an older brother. They pretty much told me the end of everything they got to see before I did.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: A sympathetic friend can be quite as dear as a brother.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: The Olympics is about letting people believe in their own dreams.
quotes.author: Kyle Shewfelt

quotes.quote: The Olympic Games belong to the athletes and not to the politicians.
quotes.author: Avery Brundage

quotes.quote: The Olympic Spirit is neither the property of one race nor of one age.
quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.quote: Every Olympics is something special. If you're fortunate enough to play for your country - there's just so much energy. It's truly amazing.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: The Olympics can no more lose money than a man can have a baby.
quotes.author: Jean Drapeau

quotes.quote: You don't win an Olympic gold medal with a few weeks of intensive training.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The Olympic Games are the quadrennial celebration of the springtime of humanity.
quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.quote: The Olympic Games are a national cause, and a national cause calls for a nationwide attitude.
quotes.author: Gianna Angelopoulos-Daskalaki

quotes.quote: The Olympic Games is the ultimate level of competition.
quotes.author: Russell Mark

quotes.quote: The Olympic Games are for the world and all nations must be admitted to them.
quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.quote: An Olympic medal is much better than a world record, and so is a world championship or Commonwealth Games medal.
quotes.author: Chad le Clos

quotes.quote: Once you become an Olympic champion, you are expected to win all the time.
quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

quotes.quote: Holding an Olympic Games means evoking history.
quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.quote: Winning an Olympic gold medal is like nothing else.
quotes.author: Rebecca Lobo

quotes.quote: The pressure of the Olympic Games is real overwhelming.
quotes.author: Natalie Coughlin

quotes.quote: Olympic athletes have to find a job right after they're done competing.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.quote: Ren watched us as he leaned casually against the table, holding a pair of scissors. I'd never seen a classroom tool look so dangerous.
quotes.author: Andrea Cremer

quotes.quote: One of these days, 'he said.' Everything bad will happen—one of these days.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Is there any phrase more ominous than 'you need to see exactly what you've done'?
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: An eerie atmosphere leeched from the soot-damaged walls. It was as if the house had died, and yet she felt she belonged here. It was as if the old place wanted to claim her from the grave.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: What is ominous is the ease with which some people go from saying that they don't like something to saying that the government should forbid it. When you go down that road, don't expect freedom to survive very long.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: The worsening of relations between a declining America and an internally troubled Mexico could even give rise to a particularly ominous phenomenon: the emergence, as a major issue in nationalistically aroused Mexican politics, of territorial claims justified by history and ignited by cross-border incidents.
quotes.author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

quotes.quote: My dad had a retail business in Leavenworth, Kansas, and there's a whole bunch of prisons there, so it was a backdrop of my childhood, these ominous prisons sitting off the road.
quotes.author: Eric Stonestreet

quotes.quote: Every nation feels itself to be superior, but in America it's a jaunty feeling, and in some cases a rather ominous one among the super-patriots.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: As a novelist, you have to pick your battles. You are tired. You have begun to experience the first ominous tinglings of carpal tunnel syndrome. You wake up in the middle of the night with both hands lying across your chest like a couple of plucked bird carcasses, dead of all sensation.
quotes.author: Lynn Coady

quotes.quote: Like gods, we have created a new universe called cyberspace that contains great good and ominous evil. We do not know yet if this new dimension will produce more monsters than marvels, but it is too late to go back.
quotes.author: David Horsey

quotes.quote: That ominous warning usually means a really bad one is coming!
quotes.author: James Hurst

quotes.quote: The ominous drum murmurs to the people of their ancient wrongs.
quotes.author: Adolphe d'Ennery

quotes.quote: It is an ominous fact that man's knowledge allows him to obliterate his very civilization, if he chooses.
quotes.author: Jerome Brondfield

quotes.quote: In the midst of my travels, I heard of an ominous rumor... It said that a monster from the ancient world had been excavated from beneath the city of Pejite where it had been sleeping
quotes.author: Hayao Miyazaki

quotes.quote: Greed surreptitiously slaps / Selflessness is an idol of unbelievable courage / a tenacity that makes you fearlessly overcome / even the most belligerently ominous impediments in pragmatic life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: She felt uneasy on the horse, not that she hadn't ridden often as a younger woman, but today's mission, coupled with her own worries about Addie Donovan, made the forest seem ominous.
quotes.author: Lisa Jackson

quotes.quote: Threats to identity are manifested in many different forms and a taxonomy of the events and experiences which have acted as such would prove interesting but would be essentially uninformative at the theoretical level.
quotes.author: Glynis M. Breakwell

quotes.quote: The immediate origin of the threat can be either internal or external.
quotes.author: Glynis M. Breakwell

quotes.quote: The human danger response is completely normal.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Blaustein

quotes.quote: When our brain recognizes danger, it prepares our body to deal with it.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Blaustein

quotes.quote: We have 3 major ways to deal with something dangerous: We can fight it, we can get away from it, or we can freeze.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Blaustein

quotes.quote: When the brain recognizes danger, the 'action' or 'doing' part of our brain sends a signal to our body to release a bunch of chemicals, like fuel for a car.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Blaustein

quotes.quote: Once our alarm turns on, our brain prepares our body for action. When that happens, our body fills with 'fuel' to prepare is for dealing with danger. This is really important if it's real danger.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Blaustein

quotes.quote: If the experience of subjecting one's self to danger and emerging victorious in sports is so pleasurable, then perhaps it is not so far fetched to consider that the policeman's emotional reaction to being in the street and successfully handling dangerous or potentially dangerous situations may be very pleasurable in terms of the adrenaline rush of excitement and the self-satisfaction he feels.
quotes.author: Philip Bonifacio

quotes.quote: When you are walking down the street and two guys come out of a liquor store after holding it up, that's accidental danger.
quotes.author: Philip Bonifacio

quotes.quote: Everyone has the capacity to be 'turned on' by danger, provided he or she chooses to take the risk and master it.
quotes.author: Philip Bonifacio

quotes.quote: When one voluntarily subjects him or herself to danger, there is an exhilarating rush that cannot be replaced in safe conditions.
quotes.author: Philip Bonifacio

quotes.quote: Chronic and intense anxiety is particularly likely to develop when an inherited strong level of physiological arousability combines with a learning history that fosters the perception that aversive events are unpredictable and uncontrollable. For such a person, the tendencies to perceive threat to be ever-present, or lurking around every corner, and to be constantly on guard and aroused in preparation for dealing with danger become understandable.
quotes.author: Richard E. Zinbarg

quotes.quote: The amygdala determines whether danger (innate or learned) is present and, if so, initiates bodily responses that were designed by evolution to deal with dangers.
quotes.author: Joseph LeDoux

quotes.quote: Fear in panic patients has no apparent relationship to any actual threat and often involves abnormal sensitivity to uncomfortable somatic sensations.
quotes.author: Joseph LeDoux

quotes.quote: When people go through something rough in life, they say, 'I'm taking it one day at a time.' Yes, so is everybody. Because that's how time works.
quotes.author: Hannibal Buress

quotes.quote: Everybody is looking for instant success, but it doesn't work that way. You build a successful life one day at a time.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: I live one day at a time, one day at a time. Yesterday's gone and tomorrow is blind, so I live one day at a time.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Live one day at a time and make it a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Dale West

quotes.quote: I'll never worry about not being successful. I'll just take it one day at a time, one season at a time. And play as hard as I can.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: Do only one thing at a time. It is lazy people who want to do everything at once.
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: There's only one day at a time here, then it's tonight and then tomorrow will be today again.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I try to take it one day at a time, but sometimes several days attack me at once.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: There's no straighter road to success than exceeding expectations one day at a time.
quotes.author: Robin Crow

quotes.quote: It's not just about getting a song on the radio or appearing on television. It really is about helping people change their lives one day at a time.
quotes.author: Yolanda Adams

quotes.quote: I believe in one day at a time; you've got TODAY, that's what you' ve got.
quotes.author: Al Pacino

quotes.quote: Take life on life's terms - one day at a time. And have fun while you're doing it.
quotes.author: Joe Perry

quotes.quote: Live one day at a time, unless you can figure out how to live two.
quotes.author: Dik Browne

quotes.quote: This is my report on how to live... They say the best way is just to live one day at a time... If you try to live seven days at a time, the week will be over before you know it.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Live one day at a time emphasizing ethics rather than rules.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: I like my life. I've had a good life. I think the reason is my parents taught me that life is a burden. But if you take it one day at a time, it's an easy burden.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: A lot of things have been thrown at me in life, and I've got through it all without a rule book, taking it one day at a time.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Always remember that the future comes one day at a time.
quotes.author: Dean Acheson

quotes.quote: Live one day at a time. Keep your attention in present time. Have no expectations. Make no judgements. And give up the need to know why things happen as they do. Give it up!
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: I'm still growing I take each day, one day-at-a-time. I'm always thinking and dreaming. As long as this heart keeps beating, there will be new things coming along.
quotes.author: Roy Haynes

quotes.quote: I've been sober now for a couple of years and I'm taking my sobriety very seriously - one day at a time and I am moving forward in my career.
quotes.author: Daniel Baldwin

quotes.quote: I never have planned a whole lot of future. It's one day at a time.
quotes.author: Darrell Royal

quotes.quote: Take one step at a time. A complex problem can be overwhelming, even when you've got your plan mapped out, but remember: the journey of a thousand miles begins with one step. Just focus on one small goal at a time.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: No matter how difficult your situation is, you can get through it if you don't look too far into the future, and focus on the present moment. You can get through anything one day at a time.
quotes.author: Bob Parsons

quotes.quote: Life's so full that you just take it one day at a time.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: Many times, the decisions we make affect and hurt your closest friends and family the most. I have a lot of regrets in that regard. But God has forgiven me, which I am very thankful for. It has enabled me to forgive myself and move forward one day at a time.
quotes.author: Lex Luger

quotes.quote: It's one day at a time, that's all there is to it, and so I don't have to worry about it. All I do is, okay, I do not have to drink. And if I feel like it, I postpone it for ten minutes, and that way I find something else to do in the meantime.
quotes.author: Malachy Mccourt

quotes.quote: Quit worrying about how everything is going to turn out. Live one day at a time; better yet, make the most of this moment.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Live one day at a time, and never be afraid.
quotes.author: Tammy Faye Bakker

quotes.quote: Do one thing at a time and do that one thing as if your life depended upon it.
quotes.author: Eugene Grace

quotes.quote: One of the greatest pain and agony is being in one sided love with someone.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash

quotes.quote: All relationships have one law : Never make the one you love feel alone, especially when youre there.
quotes.author: Anmol Andore

quotes.quote: Even if you tear me to pieces or even if you reduce me to ashes, I would still go back and give you my heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to do is watch the one you love, love someone else.
quotes.author: Poise

quotes.quote: You can sacrifice and not love. But you cannot love and not sacrifice.
quotes.author: Kris Vallotton

quotes.quote: Break my face, my back, my arms, my neck. But please don't break my heart.
quotes.author: Sarah Bettens

quotes.quote: I'm not sure what scare me more, that you will never start loving me, or that I will never stop loving you. Too sad to miss you, too bad to lose you, too hard to forget you!
quotes.author: Amogh Tiwari

quotes.quote: Loved her enough to pretend otherwise. Loving someone who doesn't love you in return, is like trying to fly with a broken wing.
quotes.author: Amogh Tiwari

quotes.quote: Did you feel empty without her? Ask the counselor. He replied It feels like I have acid rain in my brain, and it’s killing the flowers of my heart.
quotes.author: Amogh Tiwari

quotes.quote: What nobody seems to understand is that love can only be one sided, that no other love exists, that in any other form it is not love. If it involves less than total giving, it is not love. It is impotent, for the moment it is nothing.
quotes.author: Andrei Tarkovsky

quotes.quote: It hurts when you have someone in your heart but you can't have them in your arms.
quotes.author: Belinda Hernandez

quotes.quote: Maybe I was destined to forever fall in love with people I couldn't have. Maybe there’s a whole assortment of impossible people waiting for me to find them. Waiting to make me feel the same impossibility over and over again.
quotes.author: Carol Rifka Brunt

quotes.quote: Unrequited love is a ridiculous state, and it makes those in it behave ridiculously.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: I did not know how long it took to get over such a love, and that even when you did, when you loved again, you would always carry a sliver of it in your stitched together heart.
quotes.author: Christina Haag

quotes.quote: Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart.
quotes.author: Christina Westover

quotes.quote: Yet my longing for her was like a bad cold that had hung on for years despite my conviction that I was sure to get over it at any moment.
quotes.author: Donna Tartt

quotes.quote: Desiring another person is perhaps the most risky endeavor of all. As soon as you want somebody really want him, it is as though you have taken a surgical needle and sutured your happiness to the skin of that person, so that any separation will now cause a lacerating injury.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Unrequited love does not die, it’s only beaten down to a secret place where it hides, curled and wounded. For some unfortunates, it turns bitter and mean, and those who come after pay the price for the hurt done by the one who came before.
quotes.author: Elle Newmark

quotes.quote: Some say that one sided love is better than none, but like half a loaf of bread, it is likely to grow hard and moldy sooner.
quotes.author: Eric Berne

quotes.quote: To burn with desire and keep quiet about it is the greatest punishment we can bring on ourselves.
quotes.author: Federico García Lorca

quotes.quote: Sometimes it’s better to keep silent than to tell others what you feel, because it hurts badly when you come to know that they can hear you, but they can't understand.
quotes.author: Heinrich Ferreira

quotes.quote: Waiting for you is like waiting for rain in the drought which was useless and disappointing.
quotes.author: Himanshu Chate

quotes.quote: Let no one who loves be called altogether unhappy. Even love unreturned has its rainbow.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Because what’s worse than knowing you want something, besides knowing you can never have it?
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: You can't fix yourself by breaking someone else.
quotes.author: Jay Payleitner

quotes.quote: I wanted so badly to lie down next to her on the couch, to wrap my arms around her and sleep. Not fuck, like in those movies. Not even have sex. Just sleep together, in the most innocent sense of the phrase. But I lacked the courage and she had a boyfriend and I was gawky and she was gorgeous and I was hopelessly boring and she was endlessly fascinating. So I walked back to my room and collapsed on the bottom bunk, thinking that if people were rain, I was drizzle and she was hurricane.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: You like someone who can't like you back because unrequited love can be survive in a way that once requited love cannot.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as one sided love in the world. It's only that two vectors are separated by barren stretches of time, space and lives.
quotes.author: Kartikey Singh

quotes.quote: Isn't that how falling in love so often works? Some stranger appears out of nowhere and becomes a fixed star in your universe.
quotes.author: Kate Bolick

quotes.quote: It’s kind of funny how someone person can break your heart, and you can still love them with all the little pieces.
quotes.author: Kuhhrizma Clemons

quotes.quote: You like someone who can’t like you back because unrequited love can survive in a way that once-requited love cannot.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Perhaps unrequited love was a specter in the house, a presence that brushed at the edge of senses, a heat in the dark, and a shadow under the sun.
quotes.author: Sherry Thomas

quotes.quote: Because, if you could love someone, and keep loving them, without being loved back then that love had to be real. It hurt too much to be anything else.
quotes.author: Sarah Cross

quotes.quote: If you don’t receive love from the ones who are meant to love you, you will never stop looking for it.
quotes.author: Robert Goolrick

quotes.quote: For so long, I've only had one-sided feelings for other people. I've completely forgotten how good it feels to be loved.
quotes.author: Hinako Takanaga

quotes.quote: One sided relationship is no relationship at all. The relationship blossoms when there is trust love and affection between all concerned
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: If you know you can't take it, then baby, why try to give it? Cause I ain't for no one-sided love affair.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Our time is up. Trying to make this work, it ain't enough one-sided love.
quotes.author: Blackbear

quotes.quote: Nobody's home but me I'm the only one hangin' on one-sided love.
quotes.author: Brooke Hogan

quotes.quote: If you wanna be hugged. Well, you've gotta hug me, too. Yeah, 'cause I ain't for no one-sided love affair.
quotes.author: Aldo

quotes.quote:
One sided love is never gonna work. So let me tell you something that' I'm sure you've never heard of
tender love and care in case you're unaware.
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.quote: There's nothing quite as sad as a one-sided love. When one doesn't care at all and the other cares too much.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Well you know that I love you more than anyone can but a one-sided love I just don't understand.
quotes.author: The Beatles

quotes.quote: With a love that's so one sided there's no chance at all. The walls have got to fall.
quotes.author: Sonny & Cher

quotes.quote: One sided everything about your love was one sided.
quotes.author: Kelsea Ballerini

quotes.quote: In the end, we all just want someone that chooses us, over everyone else, under any circumstances.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People will hold your hand through the darkness but then let go when they find the light.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She wrote you letters every day. She sang your name in the wind. She smiled only for you. And yet, all of this meant nothing to you. Now that she has gone into the arms of someone else, you are left haunted by the pieces she left you with. All you can do now is wonder into the abyss of what ifs and regret.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you allow people to make more withdrawls than deposits in your life, you will be out of balance & in the negative! Know when to close the account.
quotes.author: Christie Williams

quotes.quote: No relationship in this world ever remains warm and close unless good effort is made on both sides to keep it so.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Loving someone who will never love you back is like going to war and standing in the line of fire with your arms wide open.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There comes a time when you have to stop crossing oceans for people who won`t even jump a puddle for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's hard to wait around for something that you know might never happen. but it's even harder to give up when you know it's everything you want.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A relationship is nothing if all the feelings, sacrifices, contributions and hard work are only coming from one end.
quotes.author: Kisstopher

quotes.quote: Any relationship (friend, romantic or business) that's one sided isn't one; it's a one way street headed in one direction nowhere. Cultivation requires input from willing participants.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Relationships are worth fighting for, but sometimes you can't be the only one fighting.
quotes.author: Emily Christine

quotes.quote: When you're writing, your mind has a place where the stories happen. With one word, you can get the idea of where you are.
quotes.author: Luis Negron

quotes.quote: One word is worth a thousand pictures. If it's the right word.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: For one word a man is often deemed to be wise, and for one word he is often deemed to be foolish. We should be careful indeed what we say.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: One kind word can warm three winter months.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: You just write one word and that tells you what the next word is going to be.
quotes.author: Terry Bozzio

quotes.quote: One word of truth outweighs the whole world.
quotes.author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: One word can give someone the strength they needed at the moment or it can shred them down to nothing.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: One word of love is worth more than a thousand clever speeches.
quotes.author: Harold Klemp

quotes.quote: In one word, this ideal is that you are divine.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: In a room where people unanimously maintain a conspiracy of silence, one word of truth sounds like a pistol shot.
quotes.author: Czeslaw Milosz

quotes.quote: One word could change the whole world.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: You will not pit one word of God against another word of God.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Whatever you want to say, there is only one word to express it, only one verb to give it movement, only one adjective to qualify it.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Sometimes one word can recall a whole span of life.
quotes.author: Edna O'Brien

quotes.quote: One man's word is no man's word; we should quietly hear both sides.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Put one word after another. Find the right word, put it down.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: There is only one word of tenderness we could say, which we have not said oftentimes before ; and there is no consolation in it. The happy never say, and never hear said, farewell.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: One word of God can do more than ten thousand words of men to relieve a distressed soul.
quotes.author: John Flavel

quotes.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You never know when one act, or one word of encouragement can change a life forever.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Forever is a measure of time used by people who share an ordinary love. Our extraordinary love is immeasurable ... for us, forever just won't do.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I want you for always...days, years, eternities.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: To my dear wife...From the moment I married you Love and happiness abound All that surrounds me is beauty When you are around! Thankful for all the happiness you give me! Happy Anniversary!
quotes.author: Rushi Kanya

quotes.quote: I am afraid that being around a couple as sweet as you will make me diabetic. Happy first anniversary.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Since first impressions are the last impressions, be sure to celebrate your first anniversary as if it is the most important anniversary of your life. Happy first anniversary.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If I had my life to live over again, I would find you sooner so that I could love you longer.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The sweet innocence of your love is profound. In this regard, may maturity be never found. Happy 1st anniversary.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Take pride in knowing that you possess the kind of love that everyone aspires to one day find. May your hearts always remain as caring and passionate as when you fell in love. Happy Anniversary!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I take pride in wishing you both on your first anniversary because you are a perfect example of a happy and loving couple. Have a good one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.quote: Grow old with me, the best is yet to be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: I will spend an eternity loving you, caring for you, respecting you, showing you every day that I hold you as high as the stars.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Real love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: At last, the joyous day has arrived! My first anniversary in an unbroken home. Maybe this will lighten the mood. Happy anniversary.
quotes.author: Fred Barron

quotes.quote: I was just thinking... we got an anniversary coming up and I was wondering what kind of anniversary present you wanted.
quotes.author: Thomas Rickman

quotes.quote: You said this was our anniversary. Let's do something - different.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: Happy anniversary. Anniversaries come but once a year, bringing joy and good cheer. Some are sad, some are funny...
quotes.author: Jay Sommers

quotes.quote: You know, the problem with being married so long is that every year, there's another anniversary. It's alright in the beginning - you can start off with gifts like jewelry and perfume. But, erm, as the years go by, you have to come up with something bigger and more original.
quotes.author: Fred Barron

quotes.quote: I've only had three good ideas in my life: marrying your mother, using a hot-dog as a straw, and taking her on that train ride on our first anniversary.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: I didn't say we weren't intimate, there are special occasions. Anniversaries and... well, on our anniversary.
quotes.author: Greg Glienna

quotes.quote: One man's garbage is another man's anniversary present.
quotes.author: Linwood Boomer

quotes.quote: Anniversaries like these always leave me with a strange kind of longing.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: Tomorrow will come and girl / I can't wait it's our anniversary (echo) anniversary / The first thing I'll do is run straight to you it our anniversary (echo) anniversary
quotes.author: Burt Bacahrach

quotes.quote: The oneness of human beings is the basic ethical thread that holds us together.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.quote: When traversing the vast sea of loneliness, Oneness is the only true safe harbor.
quotes.author: Gary Hopkins

quotes.quote: Be at peace in the oneness of things, and all errors will disappear by themselves.
quotes.author: Sengcan

quotes.quote: The journey towards oneness emphasizes the opposites and we are caught in their conflict.
quotes.author: Llewellyn Vaughan-Lee

quotes.quote: The great concepts of oneness and of majestic order seem always to be born in the desert.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The heart of the matter is always our oneness with divine spirit, our union with all life.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Oneness with Nature is the glory of childhood; oneness with childhood is the glory of the Teacher.
quotes.author: G. Stanley Hall

quotes.quote: Transcendent Oneness does not require self-examination, self-help, or self-work. It requires self-loss.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.quote: Consider your own place in the universal oneness of which we are all a part, from which we all arise, and to which we all return.
quotes.author: David Fontana

quotes.quote: Oneness is inner silence, which remains undisturbed by external factors. This silence is not the opposite of noise. That is inner Oneness.
quotes.author: Kalki Bhagavan

quotes.quote: If you want oneness in society, you have to teach people to go inside instead of going outside, because if they want peace, they need to find it within.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: If you cannot reach a state of utter oneness with each other, how do you expect to solve anything? Separate the world will crumble; together the world will thrive.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ott

quotes.quote: All differences in this world are of degree, and not of kind, because oneness is the secret of everything.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Goodness Is oneness-love In perfect action.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Students achieving Oneness will move on to Twoness.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: When we love others we see our oneness with others.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Unity does not mean sameness. It means oneness of purpose.
quotes.author: Priscilla Shirer

quotes.quote: The prayer that is heard is not of many words....but of Oneness.
quotes.author: Vivian Amis

quotes.quote: The final goal of all religions is to realise the essential oneness.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The oneness of community for instance is at the heart of our culture.
quotes.author: Steven Biko

quotes.quote: You tap in to this oneness and become part of the universe as a whole.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: When there's nothing but humility, there's nothing but spiritual oneness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: As long as we separate this oneness into two we won't achieve realization.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The waves of hatred-night can easily be dissolved in the sea of oneness-love.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: There is only one real comfort and it's not a feeling. It is the comfort of oneness.
quotes.author: John de Ruiter

quotes.quote: A Oneness of all. An evolution in consciousness of us all that isn't about the egos.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: We are all more or less ill till we find -Self-enquiry our Oneness with everyone else.
quotes.author: Douglas Harding

quotes.quote: Loving friends let kindness grow in their hearts, creating a oneness with their souls.
quotes.author: Tom Baker

quotes.quote: On the platform of reality, on the platform of oneness of life, all differences dissolve.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: The purpose of both, awareness and consciousness, is to lead us towards this path of Oneness.
quotes.author: Gian Kumar

quotes.quote: The next day, she was silent. For breakfast, she murdered an onion and served it raw.
quotes.author: Adam Johnson

quotes.quote: Bert's wallet is like an onion. Any time he opens it, he starts crying.
quotes.author: Brendan Morrison

quotes.quote: Life is an onion - you peel it year by year and sometimes cry.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Happy is said to be the family which can eat onions together. They are, for the time being, separate, from the world, and have a harmony of aspiration.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: In onion is strength; and a garden without it lacks flavour. The onion, in its satin wrappings, is among the most beautiful of vegetables; and it is the only one that represents the essence of things. It can almost be said to have a soul.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: I don't want the viewer to be able to peel away the layers of my painting like the layers of an onion and find that all the blues are on the same level.
quotes.author: Chuck Close

quotes.quote: For an Apple is in it self a little Universe; the Seed, hotter than the other parts thereof, is its Sun, which diffuses about it self that natural Heat which preserves its Globe: And in the Onion, the Germ is the little Sun of that little World, which vivifies and nourishes the vegetative Salt of that little mass.
quotes.author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quotes.quote: Like the layers of an onion, under the first lie is another, and under that another, and they all make you cry.
quotes.author: Derrick Jensen

quotes.quote: Man is like an onion. His potential is exposed one layer at a time until all he is, is known by all.
quotes.author: Dr. Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: The (editing) work was like peeling an onion. The outer skin came off with difficulty... but in no time youd be down to its innards, tears streaming from your eyes as more and more beautiful reductions became possible.
quotes.author: Edward Blishen

quotes.quote: Life is like an onion: you peel off layer after layer and then you find there is nothing in it.
quotes.author: James Huneker

quotes.quote: Reality, it seems, is not a flat plane, but has as many veils as an onion has skins.
quotes.author: Johnny Rich

quotes.quote: Acting is like peeling an onion. You have to peel away each layer to reveal another.
quotes.author: Juliette Binoche

quotes.quote: True friends chop the onions and cry together.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: Writers are like onions, layers upon layers upon layers.
quotes.author: Luke Taylor

quotes.quote: Onions make me sad, a lot of people don't realize that. When I'm cutting onions, I'm sad. Because the plight of onions, it's sad. But people don't realize I'm actually crying - they think I'm just reacting.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how precisely the onion is cut as long as the person chewing it is happy.
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.quote: It's toughest to forgive ourselves. So it's probably best to start with other people. It's almost like peeling an onion. Layer by layer, forgiving others, you really do get to the point where you can forgive yourself.
quotes.author: Patty Duke

quotes.quote: When an orange tastes like an onion, the knife takes the blame. But it is the one who handed us the knife that should be questioned.
quotes.author: Paul Bamikole

quotes.quote: A woman always has half an onion left over, no matter what the size of the onion, the dish or the woman.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Indeed, you become what you eat. In which case I am an onion. Layered, slightly sour and guaranteed to bring tears to the eyes.
quotes.author: Tobsha Learner

quotes.quote: An onion can make people cry but there's never been a vegetable that can make people laugh.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: There is an unfair responsibility that comes with being an only child - you grow up knowing you arent allowed to disappoint, you're not even allowed to die.
quotes.author: Gillian Flynn

quotes.quote: I am the only child of parents who weighed, measured, and priced everything; for whom what could not be weighed, measured, and priced, had no existence.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: If you ever wonder what being an only child is like, just imagine third wheeling your parents every day.
quotes.author: Caroline Bologna

quotes.quote: I'm an only child. Which is kind of bad, because having a brother or sister is like another form of friendship. That's something I've missed out on, except I know that I couldn't be doing what I am doing now if I had brothers and sisters.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.quote: I think that's important for all ages, to not be afraid of being an individual. I grew up on my own, as an only child, so early on I think I was quite capable of making decisions by myself and being an individual.
quotes.author: Noel Clarke

quotes.quote: As an only child, I never felt insecure and always had total love.
quotes.author: Willard Scott

quotes.quote: Only children believe they're capable of everything.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I wish I had a siblings to share my parents affections with.. Said no only child ever..
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you are an only child, feel honored. It means your parents got it right the first time and stopped at you!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I was an only child. I've known only children. From this experience I do believe that the children should outnumber the parents.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: There's a kind of intimacy that happens between a mother and an only child. Which only gets more intimate when it's between a mother and only daughter.
quotes.author: Leigh Newman

quotes.quote: Attributing feelings to inanimate things is probably a symptom of only-child-ness. Who else to talk to when the parents fight except walls and banisters and things?
quotes.author: Weike Wang

quotes.quote: When you're an only child, you get very used to pleasing the adults around you.
quotes.author: Rachel Bloom

quotes.quote: If you're an only child, you spend a lot of time by yourself, and you develop a strong ability to entertain yourself, to conjure up fantasy.
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.quote: I'm an only child, and I think one of the sweet things about that is that my parents are really interested in every aspect of my life.
quotes.author: Karen Thompson Walker

quotes.quote: I think being an only child created in me a degree of self-reliance, which I'm glad of. It made me perfectly happy with my own company and perhaps was good conditioning for the protracted solitude of writing books as slowly as I do.
quotes.author: Alan Hollinghurst

quotes.quote: If you don't understand how a woman could both love her sister dearly and want to wring her neck at the same time, then you were probably an only child.
quotes.author: Linda Sunshine

quotes.quote: Being an only child, my mother reared me very carefully.
quotes.author: Heber J. Grant

quotes.quote: I grew up as the only child, and we did not have a large family. So for me and my mother, our friends tend to become our family.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great compassion penetrates into the marrow of the bone. It is the support of all living beings. Like the love of a parent for an only child, the tenderness of the Compassionate One is all-pervasive.
quotes.author: Akkineni Nagarjuna

quotes.quote: A person who has power has an open mind. Their mind is open and they can see on other levels. Seeing is a quality that comes to a person who has personal power.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: An open mind isn't the same thing as an empty head.
quotes.author: Hal Urban

quotes.quote: You have to be very nimble and very open minded. Your success is going to be very dependent on how your adapt.
quotes.author: Jeremy Stoppelman

quotes.quote: Open up your heart and mind to the infinite wonderful experiences there are in life.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Mind has door. A password can open it. That word is stored safely in your heart, waiting for your willingness to retrieve it.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: With an open mind, you are the imagination of universal consciousness and the creation of the subconscious mind that wanders throughout the universe.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Until the mind is open, the heart stays closed. The open mind is the key to the open heart.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: A fully open mind could shatter the skull in both directions.
quotes.author: Henry Flynt

quotes.quote: Keep an open mind and be ready to change and adapt to the situation. Don't ask reality to conform to your blueprint, but transform your blueprint to adapt to reality.
quotes.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

quotes.quote: An open mind is all very well in its way, but it ought not to be so open that there is no keeping anything in or out of it.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Keeping your mind open in the face of uncertainty is the single most powerful secret of unleashing your creative potential.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: It's essential to keep an open mind, and to be willing better yet, eager to try new things.
quotes.author: Michael Abrash

quotes.quote: When you open your mind, you open new doors to new possibilities for yourself and new opportunities to help others.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: As soon as you open your mind to doing things differently, the doors of opportunity practically fly off their hinges.
quotes.author: Jay Abraham

quotes.quote: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Accept all that is given to you with an open mind. Every gift, whether it warmed your spirit or brought disappointment is a blessing.
quotes.author: Kaoru Shinmon

quotes.quote: An open mind is like an open window. It lets the fresh air in.
quotes.author: Mike Hernacki

quotes.quote: Keep a very open mind, keep a very open heart of what you are to face. You will be entering paradise. You will be entering the happiest life, everlasting life.
quotes.author: Mohamed Atta

quotes.quote: You have to keep your mind as wide-open as your eyes, because almost nothing is what it seems.
quotes.author: Jonathan Maberry

quotes.quote: A truly open mind means forcing our imaginations to conform to the evidence of reality, and not vice versa.
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.quote: Open your mind to the infinite possibilities that exist for you; then create within your reality the things that you desire.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: If you keep an open mind, you can learn so much from the people around you.
quotes.author: Lynn Good

quotes.quote: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Keep your heart open for love; and your mind open for innovative ideas.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Maintaining an open mind is essential when exploring the unknown, but allowing one's brains to fall out in the process is inadvisable.
quotes.author: Dean Radin

quotes.quote: Open your mind before you open your mouth.
quotes.author: Subroto Bagchi

quotes.quote: Where there is an open mind, there will always be a frontier.
quotes.author: Dorothea Brande

quotes.quote: An open mind, is the best weapon, in the fight between light and darkness.
quotes.author: Soke Behzad Ahmadi

quotes.quote: Open-mindedness is a precondition for generating new ideas, but focusing on the problem is almost equally important.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The closed mind is a disease. You need to have an open mind; otherwise life will just pass you by.
quotes.author: Danny Wallace

quotes.quote: An open mind, like an open window, should be screened to keep the bugs out.
quotes.author: Virginia Hutchison

quotes.quote: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: A fully open mind could shatter the skull in both directions.
quotes.author: Henry Flynt

quotes.quote: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: If you don't go through life with an open mind, you will find a lot of closed doors.
quotes.author: Mark W. Perrett

quotes.quote: Many a person thinks he or she has an open mind, when it is merely vacant.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Until the mind is open, the heart stays closed. The open mind is the key to the open heart.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: An open mind is better than a clenched fist.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Open your mind before your mouth.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: Above all, remember that the most important thing you can take anywhere is not a Gucci bag or French-cut jeans; it's an open mind.
quotes.author: Gail Rubin Bereny

quotes.quote: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: An open-minded person sees life without boundaries, whereas a close-minded person can only see what's beyond their eyes.
quotes.author: Kaoru Shinmon

quotes.quote: An open mind leaves a chance for someone to drop a worthwhile thought in it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you cannot be open-minded, then you do not possess your ideas, your ideas possess you.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: If we keep an open mind, too much is likely to fall into it.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: Only an open mind is big enough to contain the secrets of the universe.
quotes.author: Vera Stanley Alder

quotes.quote: An open mind but not an empty head.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: I don't need other people to have an open mind for me to be happy. I'm the only one who needs an open mind.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: The problem with open-mindedness is that it can become empty-mindedness.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: An open mind is a prerequisite to an open heart.
quotes.author: Robert M. Sapolsky

quotes.quote: There is a distinct difference between having an open mind and having a hole in your head from which your brain leaks out.
quotes.author: James Randi

quotes.quote: An open mind is as welcoming as an open door.
quotes.author: Nick Lopez

quotes.quote: An open mind is like an open window. It lets the fresh air in.
quotes.author: Mike Hernacki

quotes.quote: In order to keep an open mind, I am trying to avoid learning anything.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Beware: open-mindedness will often say, 'Everything is permissible except a sharp opinion.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A mind once opened never closes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Openness and softness of heart loves what it knows.
quotes.author: John de Ruiter

quotes.quote: Honesty and openness is always the foundation of insightful dialogue.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Openness without strength is useless; strength without openness is oppression.
quotes.author: Daniele Bolelli

quotes.quote: Openness doesn't come from resisting our fears but rather from getting to know them well.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Openness isn't the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.quote: Openness and participation are antidotes to surveillance and control.
quotes.author: Howard Rheingold

quotes.quote: Openness may not completely disarm prejudice, but it's a good place to start.
quotes.author: Jason Collins

quotes.quote: Open yourself and flow, my friend. Flow in the total openness of the living moment.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is found in openness to being and "being present" in full awareness.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Openness of mind strengthens the truth in us and removes the dross from it, if there is any.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is definitely openness to others' suffering that is dealt not with distress but with compassion.
quotes.author: Matthieu Ricard

quotes.quote: The openness of our hearts and minds can be measured by how wide we draw the circle of what we call family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: What the world needs most is openness: Open hearts, open doors, open eyes, open minds, open ears, open souls.
quotes.author: Robert Muller

quotes.quote: Openness, as currently conceived, is a way of making surrender to whatever is most powerful, or worship of vulgar success, look principled.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: Openness is also an acceptance that just as you have the inherent right to create your life as you see fit, so others have the same right with their own lives, even if their design differs from yours greatly.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: The struggle for true openness and intimacy is a lifelong struggle for all of us, gay and straight alike. And besides, a difficult life brings you to the core of yourself, where you learn what justice is and how it has to be fought for.
quotes.author: Paul Monette

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as an absolute openness. Openness is relative, I think, in all societies.
quotes.author: Peter Eisenman

quotes.quote: Joy and openness come from our own contented heart.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: First we must see that we cannot will ourselves to be open because openness is our very nature. Any tiny residue of willing, of wanting to be open takes us away from what we are. Willing never goes beyond willing. So the only way to be free from this circle is to glimpse the truth that openness is the egoless state, that it is here and now.
quotes.author: Jean Klein

quotes.quote: Trust, love, what we call sexy, who we trust in a business situation, are all based on how open we are. Openness is bodily openness, muscular relaxation, heart openness as opposed to hiding behind some emotional wall, and spiritual openness, which is actually feeling so fully into the moment that there's no separation between you and the entire moment.
quotes.author: David Deida

quotes.quote: The fourth doorway is the Doorway of Openness located in our heart center. It has to do with being open to both giving and receiving love. It's not just about being able to give, but it's also about the ability to be open to receive. There's a certain vulnerability in receiving. When we truly take in and appreciate all of the gifts of life, then our hearts are truly open in love.
quotes.author: Marci Shimoff

quotes.quote: Faith is a state of openness or trust.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Through the trials and tribulations of life come the openness to receive greatness.
quotes.author: Michelle Cruz

quotes.quote: Creativity has always depended on openness and flexibility, so let us hope for more of both in the future.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: Poetry has no investment in anything besides openness. It's not arguing a point. It's creating an environment.
quotes.author: Claudia Rankine

quotes.quote: Owning pipelines, people, products, or even intellectual property is no longer the key to success. Openness is.
quotes.author: Jeff Jarvis

quotes.quote: Real friends require honesty, openness, and even vulnerability. They also require attention and simple acts of kindness.
quotes.author: Mary Pipher

quotes.quote: Tolerance, openness and understanding towards other peoples' cultures, social structures, values and faiths are now essential to the very survival of an interdependent world.
quotes.author: Aga Khan IV

quotes.quote: Openness, respect, integrity - these are principles that need to underpin pretty much every other decision that you make.
quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

quotes.quote: Total openness to serving others is our hallmark, it alone is our title of honor!
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Those who never retract their opinions love themselves more than they love truth.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Inquire not what are the opinions of any one; but inquire what is truth.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: If you want me to treat your ideas with more respect, get some better ideas.
quotes.author: John Scalzi

quotes.quote: Opinions, like weapons, are often made for defense as well as offense.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: He who has no opinion of his own, but depends upon the opinion and taste of others, is a slave.
quotes.author: Friedrich Gottlieb Klopstock

quotes.quote: If you wish to see the truth, then hold no opinion for or against.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The greatest deception which men incur proceeds from their opinions.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Everyone has the right to their own opinionâ€¦ Yours is just wrong.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The man who never alters his opinion is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: You are not entitled to your opinion. You are entitled to your informed opinion. No one is entitled to be ignorant.
quotes.author: Harlan Ellison

quotes.quote: The fewer the facts, the stronger the opinion.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Public opinion is no more than this: what people think that other people think.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: There are as many opinions as there are people.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: It is not truth, but opinion that can travel the world without a passport.
quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: An opinion which excites no opposition at all is not worth having!
quotes.author: Marie Corelli

quotes.quote: People do not seem to realize that their opinion of the world is also a confession of character.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Never judge someone by the opinion of others.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It's funny how people have strong opinions on things they know nothing about.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Opinions cannot survive if one has no chance to fight for them.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Just because they disagree, doesn't mean you ain't right.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Don't let your opinion sway your judgment.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The opinion which other people have of you is their problem not yours.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: If you're going to say what you want to say, you're going to hear what you don't want to hear.
quotes.author: Roberto Bolaño

quotes.quote: The rule is perfect: in all matters of opinion our adversaries are insane.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are as many opinions as there are experts.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your opinion is not my reality.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: A closed mouth catches no flies.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Aim for the stars.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Aim high in your career but stay humble in your heart.
quotes.author: Korean (on ambition)

quotes.quote: Do not leave for tomorrow what you can do today.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: First come, first served.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If the eyes didn't see, the hands wouldn't take.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on opportunity)

quotes.quote: Manana (tomorrow) is often the busiest day of the week.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: New day, new fate.
quotes.author: Bulgarian (on opportunity)

quotes.quote: No time like the present.
quotes.author: Mary de la Riviere Manley

quotes.quote: Once the rice is pudding, it's too late to reclaim the rice.
quotes.author: Indonesian (on time and timeliness)

quotes.quote: One who waits for chance, may wait a year.
quotes.author: Yoruba (West African (on opportunity)

quotes.quote: Opportunities come but do not linger.
quotes.author: Nepalese (on opportunity)

quotes.quote: Strike while the iron is hot.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: When one door shuts, another opens.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Who waiteth for dead man's shoes will go long barefoot.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Whoever wins the war gets to write the history.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: How much I missed, simply because I was afraid of missing it.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Our most significant opportunities will be found in times of greatest difficulty.
quotes.author: S. Monson

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, there seems to be far more opportunity out there than ability.... We should remember that good fortune often happens when opportunity meets with preparation.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Sometimes opportunities float right past your nose. Work hard, apply yourself, and be ready. When an opportunity comes you can grab it.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews Edwards

quotes.quote: No great man ever complains of want of opportunity.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Time is limited and some opportunities never repeat themselves.
quotes.author: Belle de Jour

quotes.quote: Opportunity is a haughty goddess who wastes no time with those who are unprepared.
quotes.author: George S. Clason

quotes.quote: Opportunities will come and go, but if you do nothing about them, so will you.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: There comes a moment in every life when the Universe presents you with an opportunity to rise to your potential. An open door that only requires the heart to walk through, seize it and hang on. The choice is never simple. It's never easy. It's not supposed to be. But those who travel this path have always looked back and realized that the test was always about the heart. ...The rest is just practice.
quotes.author: Jaime Buckley

quotes.quote: Opportunity never knocks. It hangs thick in the air all around you. You breathe it unthinking, and dissipate it with your sighs.
quotes.author: Roy H. Williams

quotes.quote: The opposite of talking isn't listening. The opposite of talking is waiting.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: A sister is both your mirror - and your opposite.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of beauty is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, but indifference between life and death.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: Capitalism and democracy are the opposite of each other. Capitalism is a system that guarantees that a few are going to do very well, and everybody else is going to serve the few. Democracy means everybody has a seat at the table. Everybody.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: The opposite of a fact is a falsehood, but the opposite of one profound truth may very well be another profound truth.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is an element of faith.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Anger is energising. The opposite of anger is depression, which is anger turned inward.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Take the course opposite to custom and you will almost always do well.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: The opposite of faith is not doubt: It is certainty. It is madness. You can tell you have created God in your own image when it turns out that he or she hates all the same people you do.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Making those around you feel invisible is the opposite of leadership.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.quote: While fools shun one set of faults they run into the opposite one.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Some people think luxury is the opposite of poverty. It is not. It is the opposite of vulgarity.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Fantasy love is much better than reality love. Never doing it is very exciting. The most exciting attractions are between two opposites that never meet.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: The artist is the opposite of the politically minded individual, the opposite of the reformer, the opposite of the idealist. The artist does not tinker with the universe, he recreates it out of his own experience and understanding of life.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: If falsehood, like truth, had but one face, we would be more on equal terms. For we would consider the contrary of what the liar said to be certain. But the opposite of truth has a hundred thousand faces and an infinite field.
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem De Montaigne

quotes.quote: If civilization has an opposite, it is war. Of these two things, you have either one, or the other. Not both.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Nobility and worth are to be found only among the few, but their opposite among the many; for there is not one man of merit and high spirit in a hundred, while there are many destitute of both to be found everywhere.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Apathy -- not hate -- is the opposite of love. It is this apathy that leads first to the death of the psyche, and in its extreme form to the death of the body.
quotes.author: Jane G. Goldberg

quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: You couldn't have strength without weakness, you couldn't have light without dark, you couldn't have love without loss.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Good and evil are merely opposite sides of a coin. Get tossed in the air enough, it's easy to come down on the wrong side.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: It is not in the world of ideas that life is lived. Life is lived for better or worse in life, and to a man in life, his life can be no more absurd than it can be the opposite of absurd, whatever that opposite may be.
quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

quotes.quote: The pleasures of love are pains that become desirable, where sweetness and torment blend, and so love is voluntary insanity, infernal paradise, and celestial hell -- in short, harmony of opposite yearnings, sorrowful laughter, soft diamond.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco
