quotes.quote: Empathy is really the opposite of spiritual meanness. It’s the capacity to understand that every war is both won and lost. And that someone else’s pain is as meaningful as your own.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Light is meaningful only in relation to darkness, and truth presupposes error. It is these mingled opposites which people our life, which make it pungent, intoxicating. We only exist in terms of this conflict, in the zone where black and white clash.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.quote: Passion and courtesy are two polar opposite traits that serve to balance each other into a full-blooded whole.Without socialization, passion is a crude barbarian, and without passion, the elegant and polite are dead.Allow both passion and courtesy into your life in equal measure, and be complete.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Opposites attract - and then aggravate.
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: Opposites are not contradictory but complementary.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Oppression makes a wise man mad.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Oppression is the essence of power.
quotes.author: Ernst Kaltenbrunner

quotes.quote: All oppression creates a state of war. And this is no exception.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Standing in line is a form of oppression.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Oppression breeds the power to oppose it.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: He who allows oppression shares the crime.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Resistance to oppression is second nature.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The root of oppression is the loss of memory.
quotes.author: Paula Gunn Allen

quotes.quote: Oppression is more easily endured than insult.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: Where there is power, there is resistance.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: Only oppression should fear the full exercise of freedom.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: To forgive an oppressor is oppression upon the oppressed.
quotes.author: Umar

quotes.quote: Freeing people from oppression and despair is eternally right.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: A desire to resist oppression is implanted in the nature of man.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Oppression cannot prosper where none will submit to be enslaved.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: To oppression, plundering and abandonment, we respond with life.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: The most odious of all oppressions are those which mask as justice.
quotes.author: Robert H. Jackson

quotes.quote: Death may beget life, but oppression can beget nothing other than itself.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Oppression is often the consequence, but seldom or never the means of riches.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Wherever the real power in a Government lies, there is the danger of oppression.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: An educator in a system of oppression is either a revolutionary or an oppressor.
quotes.author: Lerone Bennett, Jr.

quotes.quote: The danger of oppression is not just being oppressed, it's becoming an oppressor.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: There is unity in the oppression. There must be absolute unity and determination, in the response
quotes.author: Julian Assange

quotes.quote: Oppression has no logic--just a self-fulfilling prophecy, justified by a self-perpetuating system.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Too often, systems of oppression turn those who are the targets of the oppression against one another.
quotes.author: Tim Wise

quotes.quote: Never forget that turning a blind eye to oppression and watching from the sidelines is itself oppression.
quotes.author: Harun Yahya

quotes.quote: People will come to love their oppression, to adore the technologies that undo their capacities to think.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: One writes fables in periods of oppression.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Idleness is the heaviest of all oppressions.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Any kind of civil rights oppression is wrong.
quotes.author: Bryan Cranston

quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.quote: Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress.
quotes.author: Nicholas M. Butler

quotes.quote: Optimism is the madness of insisting that all is well when we are miserable.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: It only ends once. Anything that happens before that is just progress.
quotes.author: Jacob On Lost

quotes.quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It isn't all over; everything has not been invented; the human adventure is just beginning.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.
quotes.author: J.R.R.Tolkien

quotes.quote: To find optimism, look for the good things in life.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Optimism can be more powerful than a battery of artillery or squadron of tanks. It can be contagious and it's necessary to being a leader.
quotes.author: General Rick Hillier

quotes.quote: The habit of looking on the bright side of every event is worth more than a thousand pounds a year.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: One of the things I learned the hard way was that it doesn't pay to get discouraged. Keeping busy and making optimism a way of life can restore your faith in yourself.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Optimism is joyful searching; pessimism is a prison of fear and a clutching at illusionary safety.
quotes.author: Kathleen A. Brehony

quotes.quote: Optimism refuses to believe that the road ends without options.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: It's not that optimism solves all of life's problems; it is just that it can sometimes make the difference between coping and collapsing.
quotes.author: Lucy Macdonald

quotes.quote: Optimism. It's not just a mind-set, it is behavior.
quotes.author: Larry Elder

quotes.quote: The predominant quality of successful people is optimism.... Your level of optimism is the very best predictor of how happy, healthy, wealthy, and long-lived you will be.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: The things you think are the disasters in your life are not the disasters really. Almost anything can be turned around: out of every ditch, a path, if you can only see it.
quotes.author: Hilary Mantel

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: CS Lewis

quotes.quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Teaching is the greatest act of optimism.
quotes.author: Colleen Wilcox

quotes.quote: It can be said of optimism that while sometimes mistaken, it is never sadly mistaken.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: In life you have three options with any situation that is a challenge. Remove yourself from the situation, change it, or accept it.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: It's easy to make good decisions when there are no bad options.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: When there are no other options, people fight harder. If the choice is life or death they have nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: An option hides where we don't want it to hide.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: There was only one option left, and it was letting go.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: There are no good options in the midst of a crisis.
quotes.author: Ruth Porat

quotes.quote: When there's no clear option, it's better to do nothing.
quotes.author: Erwin Rommel

quotes.quote: Once the options increase, settling on one becomes harder.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: You have many options in life, never make giving up one of them.
quotes.author: Austin Carlile

quotes.quote: I may be running out of options, but running out isn't an option.
quotes.author: Mark Lawrence

quotes.quote: We have two options, medically and emotionally: give up or fight like hell.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: There are only two options regarding commitment. You're either in or you're out. There's no such thing as life in-between.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: You limit your options every time you don't try your best.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: The option of quitting has long been undervalued and underused ... Quitters must not be frightened by the potentially cataclysmic outcome of a particular quit.
quotes.author: Evan Harris

quotes.quote: Starting off, all options are always open, but as soon as you choose something, you inevitably limit yourself. If you go for B, A is out.
quotes.author: Alva Noto

quotes.quote: You can theorise about the options you have but in reality they are very specific.
quotes.author: George Papandreou

quotes.quote: Better to be a desperate single with options than a desperate married with no options.
quotes.author: Amen Muffler

quotes.quote: Options allow a woman to tailor her role to her personality, but if a man expects to provide well, he expects to wear a suit, not to wear what suits him.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: Options are good. Keeps people choosing.
quotes.author: Craig Benzine

quotes.quote: There are two options: adapt or die.
quotes.author: Andy Grove

quotes.quote: Choices, options, decisions abound. Choose right, take the best option and decide well.
quotes.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quotes.quote: Have you considered the option of getting the joke? If not, try it now and redeem your soul.
quotes.author: Erik Naggum

quotes.quote: Freedom, privileges, options, must constantly be exercised, even at the risk of inconvenience.
quotes.author: Jack Vance

quotes.quote: You have to leave all your options open. And if you don't leave your options open, you're a fool.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: The minute you realize that your options are unlimited, things just start falling into place all around you.
quotes.author: John Cusack

quotes.quote: There are only two options for a ship: Either to sail to the sea and fight with the waves or rot in a port! The same is valid for the man!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There are really only two options - you can feel things, or you can shut down. But, once you decide to feel things, you don't get to pick and choose what you feel.
quotes.author: Jim Palmer

quotes.quote: If your options are closing-in around you and you feel panicked, scared and helpless, this is the time for action.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: People have to know that there are options available to us today. There is another way, and it is practical and applicable now.
quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

quotes.quote: Arm yourself with as many options as possible before making your next move.
quotes.author: Mallory Ortberg

quotes.quote: Experience is the oracle of truth; and where its responses are unequivocal, they ought to be conclusive and sacred.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Building Oracle is like doing math puzzles as a kid.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.quote: The language of excitement is at best picturesque merely. You must be calm before you can utter oracles.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Wise random strangers at bars are modern-day Oracles of Delphi, except drunk and sometimes leaving abruptly when it's their turn for karaoke.
quotes.author: Kelly Williams

quotes.quote: Man's conscience is the oracle of God.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Each man is a hero and an oracle to somebody.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The Lord whose oracle is at Delphi neither reveals nor conceals, but gives a sign.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: If you go back a few hundred years what we take for granted today would seem like magic - being able to talk to people over long distances to transmit images flying accessing vast amounts of data like an oracle. These are all things that would have been considered magic a few hundred years ago.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Many physicists these days sound like the Delphic oracle - with equations.
quotes.author: John Twelve Hawks

quotes.quote: Beauty is the oracle that speaks to us all.
quotes.author: Luis Barragan

quotes.quote: One of the nuisances of the ballot is that when the oracle has spoken you never know what it means.
quotes.author: Lord Salisbury

quotes.quote: The god, O men, seems to me to be really wise; and by his oracle to mean this, that the wisdom of this world is foolishness and of none effect.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Genius, without work, is certainly a dumb oracle, and it is unquestionably true that the men of the highest genius have invariably been found to be amongst the most plodding, hard-working, and intent men -- their chief characteristic apparently consisting simply in their power of laboring more intensely and effectively than others.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Seek above all for a game worth playing- such is the advice of the oracle to modern man.
quotes.author: Robert S. de Ropp

quotes.quote: Poetry is the utterance of deep and heart-felt truth - the true poet is very near the oracle.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: Every great man is an idol, an oracle of inquiry. Don't aspire to know the former, but aspire to know the deity in his soul.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Oracle v. Google is a vast, sprawling piece of litigation over the Android platform, one where the billions of dollars at stake were the least-significant possible consequence of the lawsuit.
quotes.author: Sarah Jeong

quotes.quote: Dreams came to men for many reasons, both as oracles and as warnings.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: All of us encounter, at least once in our life, some individual who utters words that make us think forever. There are men whose phrases are oracles; who can condense in one sentence the secrets of life; who blurt out an aphorism that forms a character, or illustrates an existence.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Conscience is an oracle of the Divinity.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: Before leaving school I consorted with The Oracle: Google.
quotes.author: Jandy Nelson

quotes.quote: What is Oracle? A bunch of people. And all of our products were just ideas in the heads of those people - ideas that people typed into a computer, tested, and that turned out to be the best idea for a database or for a programming language.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.quote: Your own reason is the only oracle given you by heaven, and you are answerable for, not the rightness, but the uprightness of the decision.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: More and more software, more and more corporate business is going to be stored and done over the Net, â€¦ And that's where Oracle could do very well.
quotes.author: Marc Klee

quotes.quote: There are two sentences inscribed upon the Ancient oracle... "Know thyself" and "Nothing too much"; and upon these all other precepts depend.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Enlarge not thy destiny, said the oracle: endeavor not to do more than is given thee in charge.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I'm a librarian, not an oracle.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: The ancient Oracle said that I was the wisest of all the Greeks. It is because I alone, of all the Greeks, know that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The folly of mistaking a paradox for a discovery, a metaphor for a proof, a torrent of verbiage for a spring of capital truths, and oneself for an oracle, is inborn in us.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: We have built no national temples but the Capitol; we consult no common oracle but the Constitution.
quotes.author: Rufus Choate

quotes.quote: Orange can be hard, sometimes she knows / Transty can also love alone / Orange can be hard, orange can be smart / Orange is the way the summer blows.
quotes.author: Pascal Deweze

quotes.quote: Hold you till it comes / Just water falling down / The orange in the sun / Never makes a sound.
quotes.author: Tad Kinchla

quotes.quote: Orange is the color of my love / Fragile orange wind in the garden.
quotes.author: Adrianne Lenker

quotes.quote: Orange is the happiest color.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Orange strengthens your emotional body, encouraging a general feeling of joy, well-being, and cheerfulness. Orange vibration foods are: oranges, tangerines, apricots, mangoes, peaches and carrots.
quotes.author: Tae Yun Kim

quotes.quote: Orange is red brought nearer to humanity by yellow.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Orange is the color of the sun. It is vital and a good color generally, indicating thoughtfulness and consideration of others.
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: Breakfast without orange juice is like a day without sunshine.
quotes.author: Anita Bryant

quotes.quote: There is no blue without yellow and without orange.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: An orange on the table, your dress on the rug, and you in my bed, sweet present of the present, cool of night, warmth of my life.
quotes.author: Jacques Prevert

quotes.quote: Orange is an underrated color, it's the second most underrated color after yellow.
quotes.author: Michel Gondry

quotes.quote: The sky takes on shades of orange during sunrise and sunset, the colour that gives you hope that the sun will set only to rise again.
quotes.author: Ram Charan

quotes.quote: Black is too morbid; red will set them on edge; pink is too juvenile; orange is freakish.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: The earth is blue like an orange.
quotes.author: Paul Eluard

quotes.quote: When you squeeze an orange, orange juice comes out, because that's what's inside. When you are squeezed, what comes out is what is inside.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons....they could really be oranges.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: You can't eat the orange and throw the peel away - a man is not a piece of fruit.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: My father always said that if you want oranges, you have to go to where the oranges grow.
quotes.author: Terrence Howard

quotes.quote: The child, attracted by the view Of that fair orange, feebly threw. A languid look-perhaps the smell convinced it that there sure must dwell a corresponding sweetness there.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: This evening on the orange tree.
quotes.author: John Shaw Neilson

quotes.quote: The orange trees o’erhung with globes of gold or thin the peachy tribes all ruddy cheeked.
quotes.author: Charles Harpur

quotes.quote: In the gutter you, the peel of some sweet golden orange fruit.
quotes.author: Mathilde Blind

quotes.quote: Bright as the orange star falling from the silent sky.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Land of the orange, fig, olive, and vine; 'Midst earth's fairest daughters the chaplet is thine.
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: Hung on laden orange-trees, whose shadowed foliage is the foil to golden lamps and oranges.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Luscious Orange is the color always makes me sigh candy colored, sugar coated know the reason why.
quotes.author: Book of Love

quotes.quote: Orange can be hard, sometimes she knows. Orange is the way the summer blows. Orange can be hard, orange can be hard, sometimes she knows. Transty can also love alone. Oranges can be hard, orange can be smart. Orange is the way the summer blows.
quotes.author: Metal Molly

quotes.quote: Someone's frozen bag of oranges. Stick my tongue in their mouth. Ok, I'll eat.
quotes.author: Belly

quotes.quote: Orange seats, orange feet, what do all that orange mean?
quotes.author: Gucci Mane

quotes.quote:
Orange is for carrots (orange)
Orange is for orange juice (orange)
Orange is for fire (fire)
Oranges are fruits (orange)
Orange is for basketball (orange)
Pencils are orangish (orange)
Orange is for goldfish (orange)
And orange is for oranges.
quotes.author: Every Child Wins

quotes.quote: The most ordinary word, when put into place, suddenly acquires brilliance. That is the brilliance with which your images must shine.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.quote: Ordinary imperfect people, always choose similarly imperfect people as friends.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: To be ordinary is a choice, for everyone has it in them to become extraordinary.
quotes.author: Lauren Lola

quotes.quote: By doing ordinary actions efficiently you will become the best among ordinary, but you will not be an extraordinary.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The ordinary scientific man is strictly a sentimentalist. He is a sentimentalist in this essential sense, that he is soaked and swept away by mere associations.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The ordinary acts we practice every day at home are of more importance to the soul than their simplicity might suggest.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: The ordinary man with extraordinary power is the chief danger for mankind not the fiend or the sadist.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Most brilliance arises from ordinary people working together in extraordinary ways.
quotes.author: Roger Von Oech

quotes.quote: Our ordinary mind always tries to persuade us that we are nothing but acorns and that our greatest happiness will be to become bigger, fatter, shinier acorns; but that is of interest only to pigs. Our faith gives us knowledge of something better: that we can become oak trees.
quotes.author: E. F. Schumacher

quotes.quote: Even the most ordinary life is a mystery if you look close enough.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bengis

quotes.quote: The mind of an ordinary man is truly near the heart.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: Ordinary people are capable of doing extraordinary things, and that's what it's all about. They must count.
quotes.author: Studs Terkel

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most ordinary things are the ones we learn to miss the most.
quotes.author: Jennifer Chiaverini

quotes.quote: As you get older, you want less from the world; you just want to experience it. Any barriers to feeling emotions get dismantled. And ordinary things become beautifully poetic.
quotes.author: Richard Linklater

quotes.quote: It's amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: You can find something truly important in an ordinary minute.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: The ordinary manner of spending their time, is the only way of judging of people's inclination and genius.
quotes.author: Ellin Devis

quotes.quote: You are an ordinary person till the day you realise that you have the power to change the world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Successful people do ordinary things with extraordinary consistency, commitment and focus.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: An ordinary man can surround himself with two thousand books and thenceforward have at least one place in the world in which it is possible to be happy.
quotes.author: Augustine BIRRELL

quotes.quote: Ordinary thinking and ordinary effort are almost never enough to generate leadership.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: On the ordinary view of each species having been independently created, we gain no scientific explanation.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: To an ordinary human being, love means nothing if it does not mean loving some people more than others.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Within everyday ordinary people, if you look closely, you can find some extraordinary things.
quotes.author: Joseph Badaracco

quotes.quote: The ordinary ministry is that which receives all of its direction from the will of God revealed in the Scriptures and from those means which God has appointed in the church for its continual edification.
quotes.author: William Ames

quotes.quote: It's the quality of the ordinary, the straight, the square, that accounts for the great stability and success of our nation. It's a quality to be proud of. But it's a quality that many people seem to have neglected.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: Ordinary morality is only for ordinary people.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Ordinary men earns responsibility towards their family, extraordinary men earns duty towards their nation.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Heroes are ordinary people who make themselves extraordinary.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Ordinary morality is only for ordinary people.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Accept the ego of extraordinary people as they have achieved something but don't accept the ego of ordinary people.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: An ordinary man gets arrogant with beauty, conceited with knowledge and ruthless with power.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Ordinary people seem not to realize that those who really apply themselves in the right way to philosophy are directly and of their own accord preparing themselves for dying and death.
quotes.author: Aristotle Socrates Onassis

quotes.quote: I only wish that ordinary people had an unlimited capacity for doing harm; then they might have an unlimited power for doing good.
quotes.author: Aristotle Socrates Onassis

quotes.quote: It's amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: To say a person with a symptom is behaving in a way that is not of the ordinary implies that there is an ordinary way to behave.
quotes.author: Brien Pittman

quotes.quote: There are no ordinary people. You have never talked to a mere mortal.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Ordinary People Attain Extraordinary Success - You Can Too!
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: Ordinary [people] avoid troubles. Extraordinary [people] turn them into advantage.
quotes.author: Enoch L. Johnson

quotes.quote: People don't follow ordinary people; they are spreading to strangers.
quotes.author: Enock Electricity

quotes.quote: True Leaders take an Ordinary Person and turn them into an Extraordinary Performer.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: I want ordinary people to enjoy a decent standard of living, with ever increasing security, comfort and joy.
quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quotes.quote: It's okay to be average, as long as you surround yourself with extraordinary people that you become the average of.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: Ordinary imperfect people, always choose similarly imperfect people as friends.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Perhaps people like us cannot love. Ordinary people can - that is their secret.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Even very ordinary people, upon closer examination, can often look extraordinary.
quotes.author: Holly Hunter

quotes.quote: I could not write about 'ordinary people' because I am not in the least interested in them.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Successful people are defined as ordinary people who never gave up on their dreams and passion is the secret of that persistence!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I think that ordinary people who are placed in extraordinary circumstances find themselves pushed beyond their limits, and learn new truths about themselves.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The real untold history of our species is that of ordinary people doing ordinary things.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Ordinary people pursue money, simple people pursue power, average people pursue fame, but extraordinary people pursue ideas.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: The ordinary think inside of the box, the extraordinary think outside of the box, but genius thinks inside, outside, below and above the box.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: If you aim at the summits, you are an ordinary person; if you aim beyond the summits you are an extraordinary person!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Let those who are looking for some extraordinary people must know that all the extraordinariness is hidden in the ordinary people!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: You are an ordinary person till the day you realise that you have the power to change the world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The beauty of ordinary lives of ordinary people in the ordinary streets is always extraordinary!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: If ordinary people complain that I speak too much of myself, I complain that they do not even think of themselves.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The impression that you are a demigod worried me. I wanted to be like an ordinary human being with virtues and vices.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: God designed it this way; He intended that His great power, wisdom, and love should become visible in very ordinary and otherwise inconsequential people.
quotes.author: Ray Stedman

quotes.quote: Organization and education, when they interact with each other, they strengthen each other, they are mutually supportive.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it.
quotes.author: Dee Hock

quotes.quote: Organization isn't about perfection; it's about efficiency, reducing stress and clutter, saving time and money and improving your overall quality of life.
quotes.author: Christina Scalise

quotes.quote: If you want people to parade your organization, aspire to have increase.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The organization of information actually creates new information.
quotes.author: Richard Saul Wurman

quotes.quote: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: The organization is a way for people to find us and deal with us and know how we operate.
quotes.author: Mitchell Baker

quotes.quote: In the successful organization, no detail is too small to escape close attention.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: The organization and constant onward sweep of this movement exemplifies the resentment of the many toward the selfishness, greed and the neglect of the few.
quotes.author: John L. Lewis

quotes.quote: The success of an organization will depend on the people you surround yourself with.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: If you want to change the culture, you will have to start by changing the organization.
quotes.author: Mary Douglas

quotes.quote: No organization ever created an innovation. People innovate, not companies.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: This organization is created to prevent you from going to hell. It isn't created to take you to heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Cabot Lodge, Jr.

quotes.quote: The more successful an organization becomes, the more difficult it is to deal with.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: An organization will tend to grow only when the advantages that can be gotten from directing the work of additional employees are less than the transaction costs of managing them.
quotes.author: Clay Shirky

quotes.quote: The key to success in any organization is identifying, developing, and empowering the right people.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: One of the functions of an organization, of any organism, is to anticipate the future, so that those relationships can persist over time.
quotes.author: Kevin Kelly

quotes.quote: The structure of software systems tend to reflect the structure of the organization that produce them
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: An organization needs to be constantly refreshed.
quotes.author: Tim Finchem

quotes.quote: Organization takes the fun out of everything.
quotes.author: Kelly Moran

quotes.quote: Organization makes a system of many appear fewer.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote: Once an organization loses its spirit of pioneering and rests on its early work, its progress stops.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: In a balanced organization, working towards a common objective, there is success.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: An organization is a set of relationships that are persistent over time.
quotes.author: Kevin Kelly

quotes.quote: Organization can never be a substitute for initiative and for judgment.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: We use the word organization to mean both the state of being organized and the groups that do the organizing.
quotes.author: Clay Shirky

quotes.quote: Every organization should tolerate rebels who tell the emperor he has no clothes.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Commit yourself to an organization or cause that genuinely fires you up.
quotes.author: Nancy Lublin

quotes.quote: Every organization has to prepare for the abandonment of everything it does.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: First comes thought; then organization of that thought, into ideas and plans; then transformation of those plans into reality. The beginning, as you will observe, is in your imagination.
quotes.author: Napolean Hill

quotes.quote: It always seem impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Organizing is just one big game of Tetris.
quotes.author: Alejandra Costello

quotes.quote: Managing your time without setting priorities is like shooting randomly and calling whatever you hit the target.
quotes.author: Peter Turla

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Cleaning and organizing is a practice, not a project.
quotes.author: Meagan Francis

quotes.quote: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Once you have a clear idea of your priorities â€“ that is your values, goals and high leverage activities, organize around them.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Order is the sanity of the mind, the health of the body, the peace of the city, the security of the state. Like beams in a house or bones to a body, so is order to all things.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: The best way to get something done is to begin.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Clutter is nothing more than postponed decisions.
quotes.author: Barbara Hemphill

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Organizating isn't about perfection; it's about efficiency, reducing stress and clutter, saving time and money and improving your overall quality of life.
quotes.author: Christina Scalise

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Successful organizing is based on the recognition that people get organized because they, too, have a vision.
quotes.author: Paul Wellstone

quotes.quote: With organization comes empowerment.
quotes.author: Lynda Peterson

quotes.quote: Stop waiting for the perfect time to get organized. Take this moment and make some progress.
quotes.author: Heidi Leonard

quotes.quote: The key to organizing an alternative society is to organize people around what they can do, and more importantly, what they want to do.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: Clutter is nothing more than a series of deferred decisions stacked on top of each other.
quotes.author: Andrew Mellen

quotes.quote: Organize yourself before you try to organize anything else.
quotes.author: C. Jay

quotes.quote: Organization is not an option; it is a fundamental survival skill and distinct competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Pam N. Woods

quotes.quote: Clutter is what you end up with when you have more stuff than you need.
quotes.author: Donna Smallin

quotes.quote: Good order is the foundation of all things.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: For every minute spent organizing, an hour is earned.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The desire for order is the only order in the world.
quotes.author: Georges Duhamel

quotes.quote: Organizing is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Being organized is all about the ABC's: Awareness and Action, Balance and Beliefs, Choices and consistency.
quotes.author: Tanya Allason

quotes.quote: Organize, don't agonize.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: Organizing has to be a 12-month endeavor.
quotes.author: Tom Perez

quotes.quote: Being organized isn't about getting rid of everything you own or trying to become a different person: it's about living the way you want to live, but better.
quotes.author: Andrew Mellen

quotes.quote: Have a time and place for everything, and do everything in its time and place, and you will not only accomplish more, but have far more leisure than those who are always hurrying.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The beauty is that through disappointment you can gain clarity, and with clarity comes conviction and true originality.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Be original. That's my best advice. You're going to find that there's something that you do well, and try to do it with as much originality as you can, and don't skimp on the words. Work on the words.
quotes.author: Bob Seger

quotes.quote: Originality is really important.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Originality is simply a pair of fresh eyes.
quotes.author: Thomas W. Higginson

quotes.quote: Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Immature poets imitate; mature poets steal.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Anymore, no one's mind is their own.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The unique must be fulfilled.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: An original artist is unable to copy. So he has only to copy in order to be original.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Always be a first rate version of yourself, instead of a second rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: You were born an original. Don't die a copy.
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
quotes.author: Julius Charles

quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for something you are not.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Insist upon yourself. Be original.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Originality is the art of concealing your sources
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Originality exists in every individual because each of us differs from the others. We are all primary numbers divisible only by ourselves.
quotes.author: Jean Guitton

quotes.quote: Create your own method. Don't depend slavishly on mine. Make up something that will work for you! But keep breaking traditions, I beg you.
quotes.author: Konstantin Stanislavisky

quotes.quote: The man with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Originality is way overrated. To make, you need to take. All great artists do.
quotes.author: Darby Bannard

quotes.quote: I think one of the reasons I'm popular again is because I'm wearing a tie. You have to be different.
quotes.author: Tony Bennett

quotes.quote: Every individual has the potential to be original.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: Originality comes from just being true to ourselves and what we value about what we see.
quotes.author: Melinda Collins

quotes.quote: True originality consists not in a new manner but in a new vision
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.
quotes.author: Sir Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: Most people imitate others.You should be original,and whatever you do, do well.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Originality does not consist in saying what no one has ever said before, but in saying exactly what you think yourself.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: Be original, be yourself. In trying to become like someone else, we are compromising our own self being. If we are not satisfied with our own self, can not find satisfaction anywhere. We should learn to keep our own self happy and remain happy under all circumstances in life. The key to being happy is a non-insisting mind, non-complaining mind, and a pure mind.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: Be the one who speaks out above the crowd when everyone else follows the norms.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: A man's originality is not only the most beautiful, but the best personality of his life.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: Children without families are the most vulnerable people in the world.
quotes.author: Brooke Randolph

quotes.quote: When you lose your parents as a child, you are indoctrinated into a club, you re taken into life's severest confidence. You are undeceived.
quotes.author: Hilary Thayer Hamann

quotes.quote: Dead mothers are rather fashionable these days. They lend such an attractive air of tragedy.
quotes.author: Heidi Schulz

quotes.quote: ORPHAN, n. A living person whom death has deprived of the power of filial ingratitude --a privation appealing with a particular eloquence to all that is sympathetic in human nature. When young the orphan is commonly sent to an asylum, where by careful cultivation of its rudimentary sense of locality it is taught to know its place. It is then instructed in the arts of dependence and servitude and eventually turned loose to prey upon the world as a bootblack or scullery maid.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: There's no shortage of orphans in 19th-century literature, but it's hard to find a single happy, communicative, functional parental relationship in the whole of 'Great Expectations,' even among the minor characters.
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: I will not leave you as orphans, I will come to you
quotes.author: Jesus in John 14:18

quotes.quote: Orphans, are the one who has no parents, but have many parents. But having ones parents is more valuable than the other having many parents (it doesn't depend on numbers, but the feelings matters).
quotes.author: Siddwin S. Shetty

quotes.quote: Late children are early orphans.
quotes.author: John Wilmot

quotes.quote: The orphan is not a cause. The orphan is not an issue. The orphan has a human face, and that face is Galilean. Jesus tells us that when we see the poor, the weak, the vulnerable, the tossed aside, we see Him there.
quotes.author: Russell D. Moore

quotes.quote: The answer to 168 million orphans in our world can be summed up in two words: family and church.
quotes.author: Kay Warren

quotes.quote: The orphan does not rejoice after a heavy breakfast.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Orphans are the only ones who get to choose their fathers, and they love them twice as much.
quotes.author: Adam Johnson

quotes.quote: Not everyone can be an orphan.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: There are orphans that can be cared for; but this some will not venture to undertake, for it brings them work more than they care to do, leaving them but little time to please themselves.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: The truth is you can be orphaned again and again and again. The truth is, you will be. And the secret is, this will hurt less and less each time until you can't feel a thing.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Marry an orphan: you'll never have to spend boring holidays with the in-laws (at most an occasional visit to the cemetery)
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Orphans are easier to ignore before you know their names. They are easier to ignore before you see their faces. It is easier to pretend they're not real before you hold them in your arms, but once you do, everything changes.
quotes.author: David Platt

quotes.quote: A woman always has her man, but the man unconsciously leans on his roots, his heritage. He feels like an orphan without his parents.
quotes.author: Raj Kapoor

quotes.quote: Orphanages are the only places that ever left me feeling empty and full at the same time.
quotes.author: John M. Simmons

quotes.quote: For a child, the loss of a parent is the loss of memory itself.
quotes.author: Svetlana Alexievich

quotes.quote: Orphaned children are equally deserving of unconditional support and love, the world is much stronger when the vulnerable are also strengthened.
quotes.author: Wayne Chirisa

quotes.quote: I guess that’s the soft spot for orphans, eh? We’re so hungry for a father that we go blind.
quotes.author: Emory R. Frie

quotes.quote: Beyond the orphanage is a journey full of hopes and aspirations.
quotes.author: Deborah Dzifah Tamakloe

quotes.quote: Never abandon widows, widowers and orphans.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You can’t avoid orphan stories, child. Every story is an orphan story. We are all orphaned sooner or later.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Zevin

quotes.quote: I believe that God is the Great Companion, that we are not left orphans, that we may have comradeship with him.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: An orphan’s curse would drag to hell, a spirit from on high; but oh! more horrible than that, is a curse in a dead man’s eye!
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A door without a knocker should keep its peace; a fatherless child does not fight an unjust fight.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes I feel like a motherless child / A long way from home.
quotes.author: Black Spiritual

quotes.quote: The otter has long seemed to me worthy of serious attention, if only for the successful struggle it has waged against those exterminating agencies.
quotes.author: J. C. Tregarthen

quotes.quote: The otter is a great wanderer, who not only traverses long stretches of coast and follows streams and rivers to their source, but crosses hills and even mountains to reach its fishing-grounds.
quotes.author: J. C. Tregarthen

quotes.quote: Healthy otters tell us we have a healthy countryside.
quotes.author: J. C. Tregarthen

quotes.quote: Geographically the otter is widely distributed, found in every continent except Antarctica and Australia.
quotes.author: Daniel Allen

quotes.quote: The identity of the otter is also by no means fixed or unchanging.
quotes.author: Daniel Allen

quotes.quote: Few people actually see the Eurasian otter in the wild, yet it has become one of the most popular species.
quotes.author: Daniel Allen

quotes.quote: Sea otters face many challenges because their unique history, biology, and nearshore habitat place them in close proximity to, and often in adverse interactions with, humans.
quotes.author: Elsevier Inc

quotes.quote: The sea otter may be one of the most widely studied and intensively managed marine mammals.
quotes.author: Elsevier Inc

quotes.quote: Otters seem to make slides for fun. They will often slide down a muddy bank into the water, climb out, and do the whole thing again.
quotes.author: Michael Leach

quotes.quote: An otter is well adapted for life in the water. It has special muscles for closing its ears and nostrils tightly so water can't get in.
quotes.author: Suzanne Tate

quotes.quote: Otters spend most of their time swimming and feeding.
quotes.author: Suzanne Tate

quotes.quote: I enjoy watching playful river otters in the pond behind my house. They are always on the move, dipping and diving in the water.
quotes.author: Suzanne Tate

quotes.quote: Sea otter fur ranges from brown to almost black with guard that be silver, light brown, or black. As a sea otter ages, their hands and necks will lighten until almost white.
quotes.author: Jack Dickerson

quotes.quote: Consequently, sea otter spend much of their time cleaning and grooming their fur.
quotes.author: Jack Dickerson

quotes.quote: Sea otters will only eat while they are floating, but may also groom, rest, and nurse their young.
quotes.author: Jack Dickerson

quotes.quote: Sea otters are coastal, shallow water dwellers.
quotes.author: Jack Dickerson

quotes.quote: These little fur balls are very good swimmers and can stay underwater for three to four minutes at a time. Otters are very much like you boys and girls, because they spend most of their time playing.
quotes.author: Michael R. Greyson

quotes.quote: Prior to the arrival of the European traders, the sea otter was traditionally prized for its fine fur and its pelt was worn by high-ranking people.
quotes.author: Mike Robinson

quotes.quote: Sea otters are animals that live in the ocean. They are about as big as a medium-size dog.
quotes.author: Ruth Owen

quotes.quote: Sea otters have very thick fur. The fur helps keep the otter's body warm and dry in the cold water.
quotes.author: Ruth Owen

quotes.quote: You can't keep an Otter in London it's too cruel! For the Humans, I mean!
quotes.author: Jack Couffer

quotes.quote: Even an otter picks up a rock once in a while to open a clam.
quotes.author: Chuck Lorre

quotes.quote: The sea otter is generally adorable, but it is in fact, history's greatest monster. And if we don't take action immediately, they will take over the planet and destroy us all.
quotes.author: John Rogers

quotes.quote: Otters loved the winter. They liked making angels in the snow. They liked to catch snowflakes on their tongues. Then they liked to make snow bears.
quotes.author: Leah Lepofsky

quotes.quote: The heron and the otter are my friends / And we are all connected to each other / In a circle, in a hoop that never ends!
quotes.author: Carl Binder

quotes.quote: There'll be a tear in the otter's eye down by the river / The banks will soon be black and dead / And where the otter raised his head / Will be a clean / White skull instead
quotes.author: Albert Hammond

quotes.quote: There's fireflies dancing in the cool evening breeze / There's love and romancing as nice as you please / There's otters and frogs and spotted ground hogs / And Wiley old weasels in rotted out logs
quotes.author: Gordon Lightfoot

quotes.quote: Way down south in the Everglades / Where the black water rolls and the saw grass waves / Eagles fly and the otters play in the land of the Seminole
quotes.author: John David Anderson

quotes.quote: Dive down / Into the cool green water / Swim around / By the fish and otters
quotes.author: Ed Robertson

quotes.quote: Singing in the night time, singing in the day, / When little duck quacks, and he's on his way / And the otter hasn't got much to say
quotes.author: Bill Staines

quotes.quote: The way you dress is how you greet the sun and other stars.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Before you are interviewed for the job you want, try on the complete outfit you intend to wear.
quotes.author: Edith Head

quotes.quote: Never let a trend get in the way of creating a great outfit for yourself.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: People will remember you better if you always wear the same outfit.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: Shoes are the finishing touch on any outfit and it is important to complete a look with the perfect pair!
quotes.author: Tracy Reese

quotes.quote: An exercise outfit helps because it sets this time apart from the rest of your day and makes it matter more
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Take care of your costume and your confidence will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Wear an unusual accessory to complete your outfit.
quotes.author: Chelsea Leyland

quotes.quote: Strike the right balance between your outfit and makeup. Make a statement with one, not both.
quotes.author: Madeline Zima

quotes.quote: You can change the look of an outfit so easily by changing the kind of jewellery you wear. If you have a basic outfit on - a black sweater and skirt or a simple black dress - you can go from the office to a cocktail party at night just by changing your jewellery. It helps if you change your shoes as well.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: Self confidence is the best outfit, rock it and own it.
quotes.author: Richa Kanwar

quotes.quote: With only one bag, you can change your outfit completely.
quotes.author: Sonia Rykiel

quotes.quote: Cute accessories always help bring out your outfit and pull it all together.
quotes.author: Ciara

quotes.quote: The right pair of shoes can change the feel of an outfit, and even change how a woman feels about herself.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.quote: A statement necklace glams up any outfit without feeling like too much.
quotes.author: Tracy Reese

quotes.quote: The way that people dress makes them part of an army, dressed in their own uniform, determined to do something.
quotes.author: Suzy Menkes

quotes.quote: Confidence is the best accessory. It can make or break an outfit.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Guys are stimulated easily. They are easy to manipulate. All you have to do is wear a sexy outfit.
quotes.author: Jessica Alba

quotes.quote: You put on the military outfit, and it definitely tightens everything up and makes you stand up straighter.
quotes.author: Diego Klattenhoff

quotes.quote: If you keep everything in the same palette of tone on tone neutrals, even a laid back outfit of a slouchy sweater, jeans, and sneakers gives you a longer, leaner look.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.quote: Just wear what makes you happy. If you're happy, it's a great outfit
quotes.author: Alli Simpson

quotes.quote: Always try clothes on before you buy them. Stand, sit, walk and inspect yourself from all angles before you buy it so you don't regret it later. Knowing what it looks like on you is very important, as your body shape must suit the cut of the outfit.
quotes.author: Tena Desae

quotes.quote: Shoes make an outfit; they're like rims for a car.
quotes.author: Omari Hardwick

quotes.quote: There's no need to dress like everyone else. It's much more fun to create your own look.
quotes.author: Twiggy

quotes.quote: Texture is something we forget it makes outfits look very expensive. You can do a monochromatic outfit, if you're afraid of things that are more colorful and printed, and still create interest.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: If a great outfit gets you one step closer to feeling good about yourself, then it's worth every penny.
quotes.author: Rachel Roy

quotes.quote: A woman makes an outfit her own with accessories.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: The truth about injustice always sounds outrageous.
quotes.author: James H. Cove

quotes.quote: Let us never tolerate outrageous conspiracy theories.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: The most outrageous lies that can be invented will find believers if a person only tells them with all his might.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It's outrageous to me when I see people hate on someone because of their sexuality. I hate the intolerance. I hate the judgment. I hate it so much.
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.quote: In difficult times, fashion is always outrageous.
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to be outrageous; the critics will shoot you down anyway.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: People find meaning and redemption in the most unusual human connections.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: It requires a very unusual mind to undertake the analysis of the obvious.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: It's outrageous to line your pockets off the misery of the poor; It's outrageous, the crimes some human beings must endure.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: Outrageous behavior, also known as the lunatic fringe, is the seed bed of innovation and creativity.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: Your ability to use mind whatever way you choose is outrageous. Much will depend upon how intensely you approach the study and the state of mind in which you begin.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: We live in a world of outrageous pain. The only response to outrageous pain is outrageous love.
quotes.author: Marc Gafni

quotes.quote: Be outrageous, ridicule the fraidy-cats, rejoice in all the oddities that freedom can produce.
quotes.author: Molly Ivins

quotes.quote: The most outrageous thing we can do in this world is to accept what happens and fly with it.
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: It requires a serious mind and a determined heart to pray past the ordinary into the unusual.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Most of the humor comes from how outrageous the situations and circumstances are.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.quote: Sometimes you get an idea that's so outrageous it's bound to be really important.
quotes.author: Brownell Landrum

quotes.quote: Great things are only possible with outrageous requests.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The person who seeks all their applause from outside has their happiness in another's keeping .
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The fruit does not come from the outside, the fruit is created within you. Whatever you do, you develop receptivity for it inside yourself. Someone who wants love should give his love. Someone who wants bliss should start sharing his bliss. Someone who wants flowers to shower in his home should shower flowers in other people's homes. There is no other way. So compassion is an emotion that each person has to develop in order to enter into meditation.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: No one outside ourselves can rule us inwardly. When we know this, we become free.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: We have no longer an outside and an inside as two separate things. Now the outside may come inside and the inside may and does go outside. They are of each other. Form and function thus become one in design and execution if the nature of materials and method and purpose are all in unison.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Stop looking outside for scraps of pleasure or fulfillment, for validation, security, or love - you have a treasure within that is infinitely greater than anything the world can offer.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: You have to color outside the lines once in a while if you want to make your life a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Those who look outside, dream. Those who look inside, awaken.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The world you see outside of you will always be a reflection of what you have inside of you.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: It isn't enough to think outside the box. Thinking is passive. Get used to acting outside the box.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Don't judge from the outside. Like any beautiful rose has thorns... the more a person appears nice on the outside, the more you should doubt the inside.
quotes.author: Gosho Aoyama

quotes.quote: The biggest rewards in life are found outside your comfort zone. Live with it. Fear and risk are prerequisites if you want to enjoy a life of success and adventure.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: A world of facts lies outside and beyond the world of words.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Adventure is not outside man; it is within.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: If we seek paradise outside ourselves, we cannot have paradise in our hearts.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Never let the darkness or negativity outside affect your inner self. Just wait until morning comes and the bright light will drown out the darkness.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: There is no power outside of man. Man has created God out of fear. So the problem is fear and not God.
quotes.author: U.G. Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: The human heart was not designed to beat outside the human body and yet, each child represented just that - a parent’s heart bared, beating forever outside its chest.
quotes.author: Debra Ginsberg

quotes.quote: Inside yourself or outside, you never have to change what you see, only the way you see it that is what you compare it to;- something better and you'll feel worse; something worse and you'll feel better.
quotes.author: Thaddeus Golas

quotes.quote: The environment is in us, not outside of us. The trees are our lungs, the rivers our bloodstream. We are all interconnected, and what you do to the environment ultimately you do to yourself.
quotes.author: Ian Somerhalder

quotes.quote: Make sure the outside of you is a good reflection of the inside of you
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The bitter and the sweet come from the outside, the hard from within, from one's own efforts.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: God cannot be found outside you, because there is no God who can ever be outside you. God is the ultimate fragrance of your consciousness. When your consciousness opens like a lotus, the fragrance that is released is God - better to call it godliness.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Everything you desire is outside your comfort zone - otherwise, you would already have it.
quotes.author: Zan Perrion

quotes.quote: Strangers are endearing because you don't know them yet.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: When immigrants go into the worse neighborhood and they fix it up, they should become citizens.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: Stranger, here you will do well to tarry; here our highest good is pleasure.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Immigrants are going back where they came. If they came from a certain country, they are going to be brought back to their country. That's the way it's supposed to be
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: A stranger is someone with whom you feel strange.
quotes.author: Robert Mandel

quotes.quote: He felt like an outsider. He felt angry, and he felt his brilliance was being overlooked. And he felt much smarter than the people around him.
quotes.author: David Vise

quotes.quote: The feeling of being an outsider, and the identity theme, are hardwired into me. If there's anything really autobiographical in my fiction, it's that feeling. I always feel that way.
quotes.author: Dan Chaon

quotes.quote: In a sea of strangers, you've longed to know me. Your life spent sailing to my shores.
quotes.author: Lang Leav

quotes.quote: Outsiders often have an insight that an insider doesn't quite have.
quotes.author: Diane Abbott

quotes.quote: When you're an outsider, you don't have loyalties to anyone, so you can be cruelly honest if need be. The more you get inside, the more you are involved in polite networks of professional coercion that make people less honest.
quotes.author: Molly Crabapple

quotes.quote: An outsider's point of view is always handy.
quotes.author: Pat Oliphant

quotes.quote: Each stranger is like an unexplored continent whose depths you want to explore before you plant your flag in his heart.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: Strangers take a long time to become acquainted, particularly when they are from the same family.
quotes.author: M.E. Kerr

quotes.quote: Being an outsider is the one thing we all have in common.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: Outsider. You do what you want, say what you want, and move on when you've worn out your welcome.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: For immigrant generations especially, family is the first structure, or shelter, for a people who are in exile
quotes.author: Alice McDermott

quotes.quote: No matter where you are, you're always a bit on your own, always an outsider.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: An outsider can see some things much better.
quotes.author: Anil Kapoor

quotes.quote: Immigrant: An unenlightened person who thinks one country better than another.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Outsider means I will accept the possibility that I don't have responsibility for what is happening inside my domain.
quotes.author: Aleksandar Hemon

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the most brilliant and intelligent minds do not shine in standardized tests because they do not have standardized minds.
quotes.author: Diane Ravitch

quotes.quote: Excellence is the target of champions and winners.
quotes.author: Mark F. LaMoure

quotes.quote: Outstanding long-term results are produced primarily by avoiding dumb decisions, rather than by making brilliant ones.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The magic behind every outstanding performance is always found in the smallest of details.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan

quotes.quote: Brilliance of the brain must be admired more than beauty of the body.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The signs of outstanding leadership appear primarily among the followers.
quotes.author: Max De Pree

quotes.quote: A person with an outstanding attitude makes the best of it while he gets the worst of it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Marvelous is the power which can be exercised, almost unconsciously, over a company, or an individual, or even upon a crowd by one person gifted with good temper, good digestion, good intellects, and good looks.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: Experience is that marvelous thing that enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Excellence is a high quality, that delivers success and achievement.
quotes.author: Mark F. LaMoure

quotes.quote: Outstanding people have one thing in common: An absolute sense of mission.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: To be of good quality, you have to excuse yourself from the presence of shallow and callow minded individuals.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Excellent people are honored wherever they go.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer.
quotes.author: Rick Pitino

quotes.quote: If you have excellent people, then you have to give them the power.
quotes.author: Shiv Nadar

quotes.quote: An excellent man, like precious metal, is in every way invariable; A villain, like the beams of a balance, is always varying, upwards and downwards.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: If you deliver excellence right now, that gives you the best shot at the best future you've got coming.
quotes.author: Robert Forster

quotes.quote: Outstanding leaders appeal to the hearts of their followers not their minds.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. If in our heart, we still cling to anything – anger, anxiety, or possessions – we cannot be free.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Try not to resist the changes that come your way. Instead, let life live through you. And do not worry that your life is turning upside down. How do you know that the side you are used to is better than the one to come.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It is time for me to let go of my old beliefs about how relationships are supposed to be.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: He’s going to be sorry he lost you, so stop worrying. Forget the past, forget the pain and remember what an incredible woman you are.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: If we believe that tomorrow will be better, we can bear a hardship today.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Expectation is the root of all heartache.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If you love them, then love in the way that frees them. Build them up. Grow them and let them grow you. Love that is confining, restrictive, and full of laws is love born out of the desperation of loneliness.
quotes.author: Jm Storm

quotes.quote: I know something better is on the road for me.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Healing comes in waves and maybe today the wave hits the rocks. And that’s OK, that’s OK darling. You are still healing. You are still healing.
quotes.author: Ijeoma Umebinyuo

quotes.quote: She reminds me nobody is worth this many tears / But all I can remember are the lies / How you were mine and I was yours / I never knew my heart could break this hard
quotes.author: Ashley Eicheldinger

quotes.quote: Despite the heartache and loss, the reason you are not hearing from me is that I am too busy taking care of myself moving on with my fabulous life.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: You gladly accept this radio silence because your relationship has been broken for a while, and get on with your grieving because you are moving on to something better.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: Now, defeating kryptonite and getting over a broken heart is incredibly tough. It's also wildly empowering. But the even bigger victory is finally living your own life again without the constant presence of heartache.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: The hard truth is that breakups are sink-or-swim. Some people spend their life in an emotional downward spiral because they can't get over lost love. Others, most notably you, use it as a turning point to reevaluate, rebuild, and possibly redecorate.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: It's called a breakup because it's broken is designed to help you not only get out of an unsatisfying relationship but to get over it so that you can be ready for the better things in life that are coming your way.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: I'm laying down my memories and slowly walking away / now that our love's over there's nothing left to say. / The times of joy and laughter the days filled with the Sun / no looking back for a new day's just begun
quotes.author: Richard Kydd

quotes.quote: Taking your love away from me / while leaving me lost in memory
quotes.author: Richard Kydd

quotes.quote: Anytime something so earth-shattering in your life happens that it breaks your heart, it also leaves the doorway of your soul open to new emotions and new mind-sets that can shake, rattle, and roll you right up to the next level.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Then why are we so willing to stay stuck in a relationship once it has become clear that the other person is not our perfect fit?
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Breakups have a way of shaking us awake and helping us see what we really want versus what we are willing to settle for.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Realize that everything and everyone that walks away from you does so because they are no longer part of your story.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: One of the best times for figuring out who you are and what you really want out of life is right after a breakup.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Breakups aren't trivial; they affect us to our core.
quotes.author: Samantha Burns

quotes.quote: There's life after breakup. Every setback is a setup for a comeback, and yours will be fierce.
quotes.author: Samantha Burns

quotes.quote: No matter your role in this breakup, whether you were dumped or you walked away, it takes serious courage and resiliency to make it through to the other side.
quotes.author: Samantha Burns

quotes.quote: Going through a breakup is actually very similar to grieving a death. You're grieving the loss of someone you love and learning to live life without them by your side.
quotes.author: Samantha Burns

quotes.quote: Although breakups can feel unbearable, we don't die from them.
quotes.author: Rachel Sussman

quotes.quote: Even if you initiated your split, you are going to be overcome with interminable sorrow. You are not only mourning the loss of someone significant in your life, but saying farewell to your dreams of an eternity together.
quotes.author: Rachel Sussman

quotes.quote: Usually right after the initial sting of the breakup, you're not going to be very hungry. You won't have an appetite and may drop a few pounds. I call it the breakup body.
quotes.author: Lesley Robins

quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Who overcomes by force, hath overcome but half his foe.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: When you know that you can overcome challenges, you do gain that self-respect, and then you won't end up in a situation that you regret later on.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: A child who has overcome challenges with proper emotional support will emerge stronger.
quotes.author: Kate Middleton

quotes.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Give yourself an even greater challenge than the one you are trying to master and you will develop the powers necessary to overcome the original difficulty.
quotes.author: William Bennett

quotes.quote: It makes one a better person to have had hardships and to have overcome hardships and not to blame anybody else for your mistakes.
quotes.author: Maureen Forrester

quotes.quote: So many objections may be made to everything, that nothing can overcome them but the necessity of doing something.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: When you accept the fact that your true identity includes being anÂ overcomer, you will never settle for less than a miracle.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to be anÂ overcomer, but nobody wants anything to overcome.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: They who overcome their desires once can overcome them always.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: You were not built for comfort and convenience. You were built to overcome.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: Who has a harder fight than he who is striving to overcome himself.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: As you seek the inner strength that helps you not only to endure but to overcome, do not look for what you can get, but for what you have been given, and for what you can give.
quotes.author: Peter J. Gomes

quotes.quote: I think everything is possible, especially for the next generation. Just look at what we've overcome.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Courage is the power of the mind to overcome fear.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: Courage gives us the strength to overcome in spite of obstacles set before us.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The ability to love and see the beauty in ourselves allows us to overcome feeelings of inadequacy and insecurity.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: We overcome bodily weakness by mental strength.
quotes.author: Cyprian

quotes.quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which one has overcome while trying to succeed.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Your purpose is to become the best person you can be. But to do this, you have to overcome your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Keith Boykin

quotes.quote: Non-violence is the answer to the crucial political and moral questions of out time: the need for man to overcome oppression and violence.
quotes.author: King

quotes.quote: The way to overcome procrastinating is to take immediate action.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: On the journey to the truth, one must stay on the path of love and enlightenment; the heart filled with greed and lust will be overcome by its selfishness.
quotes.author: Khematic Wisdom

quotes.quote: He has but one great fear who fears to do wrong; he has a thousand who has overcome it.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: When everyone believes they are the life coaches, who are the players?
