quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Do not hate the player, nor the game...rule it!
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: You need to be loyal to the people who have helped you in the past & gave you a break when you were not a big player.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: A fast car can make women 'like' a man; and a man 'like' women fast.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: Most people give up just when they're about to achieve success. They quit on the one yard line. They give up at the last minute of the game one foot from a winning touchdown.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: It isn't hard to be good from time to time in sports. What is tough, is being good every day
quotes.author: Willie Mays

quotes.quote: Don't measure yourself by what you have accomplished, but by what you should have accomplished with your ability.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: A lot of late nights in the gym, a lot of early mornings, especially when your friends are going out, you're going to the gym, those are the sacrifices that you have to make if you want to be an NBA basketball player.
quotes.author: Jason Kidd

quotes.quote: Coaching is easy. Winning is the hard part.
quotes.author: Elgin Baylor

quotes.quote: Great players are willing to give up their own personal achievement for the achievement of the group. It enhances everybody.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: Bass players are always the intellectual kind, but nobody knows it.
quotes.author: Stanley Clarke

quotes.quote: Every player should be accorded the privilege of at least one season with the Chicago Cubs. That's baseball as it should be played in God's own sunshine. And that's really living.
quotes.author: Alvin Dark

quotes.quote: You don't think about anything because you just try to playevery game, every point. If you get some chance, you try to take this chance.
quotes.author: Nikolay Davydenko

quotes.quote: I love the winning, I can take the losing, but most of all I love to play.
quotes.author: Boris Becker

quotes.quote: The difference of great players is at a certain point in a match they raise their level of play and maintain it. Lesser players play great for a set, but then less.
quotes.author: Pete Sampras

quotes.quote: Sports is human life in microcosm.
quotes.author: Howard Cosell

quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: The medals don't mean anything and the glory doesn't last. It's all about your happiness. The rewards are going to come, but my happiness is just loving the sport and having fun performing.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: To succeed...You need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
quotes.author: Tony Dorsett

quotes.quote: Give your players something they can physically do - don't ask them to do something they can't do.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: A good coach will make his players see what they can be rather than what they are.
quotes.author: Ara Parseghian

quotes.quote: We've been together since we've been teenagers. I can go away and disappear for two years, and when we get back together, it's like nothing ever has changed.
quotes.author: John Oates

quotes.quote: You're breaking up, you're getting together, you're changing your life, you're arguing with your parents, you're making terrible mistakes, you're having great triumphs. It's what happens to teenagers.
quotes.author: Jason Katims

quotes.quote: The thing that bums me out about 'The Real World' is I don't want to believe that teenagers are that stupid.
quotes.author: Kathy Griffin

quotes.quote: Teenagers are more willing to experiment, and they'll find a way to wear something if they like it.
quotes.author: Bella Freud

quotes.quote: Books are as dark as what is available to teenagers through the media every day.
quotes.author: Tamora Pierce

quotes.quote: ... And these children that you spit on as they try to change their worlds are immune to your consultations.They're quite aware of what they're going through...
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: I honestly think it is better to be a failure at something you love than to be a success at something you hate.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
quotes.author: George Edward Woodberry

quotes.quote: Forget about the consequences of failure. Failure is only a temporary change in direction to set you straight for your next success.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers, but to be fearless in facing them. Let me not beg for the stilling of my pain, but for the heart to conquer it.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: You can discover what your enemy fears most by observing the means he uses to frighten you.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You must do the thing which you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You cannot run away from weakness; you must some time fight it out or perish; and if that be so, why not now, and where you stand?
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Every time you win, it diminishes the fear a little bit. You never really cancel the fear of losing; you keep challenging it.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Fear can't hold a candle to unswerving faith, much less muster up the guts to even attempt to blow it out.
quotes.author: B.G. Jett

quotes.quote: You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Confront your fears, list them, get to know them, and only then will you be able to put them aside and move ahead.
quotes.author: Jerry Gillies

quotes.quote: When a resolute young fellow steps up to the great bully, the world, and takes him boldly by the beard, he is often surprised to find it comes off in his hand, and that it was only tied on to scare away the timid adventurers.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Fears are educated into us, and can, if we wish, be educated out.
quotes.author: Karl Augustus Menninger

quotes.quote: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: Fear is only as deep as the mind allows.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Go back a little to leap further.
quotes.author: John Clarke

quotes.quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I failed my way to success.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Don't obsess about the failures. Instead, investigate and close the successes.
quotes.author: Chip Heath and Dan Heath

quotes.quote: We learn wisdom from failure much more than success. We often discover what we will do, by finding out what we will not do.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared. It is to be understood.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Fight your fears and you'll be in battle forever. Face your fears and you'll be free forever.
quotes.author: Lucas Jonkman

quotes.quote: Do the thing you fear, and continue to do so. This is the quickest and surest way of all victory over fear.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Do not fear mistakes. You will know failure. Continue to reach out.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear. Except a creature be part coward, it is not a compliment to say it is brave.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Always listen to experts. They'll tell you what can't be done, and why. Then do it.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: When the goal seems difficult to reach, take a break but never give up.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Convince your enemy that he will gain very little by attacking you; this will diminish his enthusiasm
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Those who don't know how to suffer are the worst off. There are times when the only correct thing we can do is to bear out troubles until a better day.
quotes.author: Deng Ming-Dao

quotes.quote: If you expect life to be easy, challenges will seem difficult. If you accept that challenges may occur, life will be easier.
quotes.author: Rob Liano

quotes.quote: Never give in to the obstacles that lie in your path towards the achievement of your dreams.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Don't settle for your human capacity. Live up to your God-given potential.
quotes.author: Benjamin Lotter

quotes.quote: Don't run from your weakness, you will only give it strength.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Always follow your dreams, even if they lead you down a few dark alleys.
quotes.author: Teresa Mummert

quotes.quote: Some people will just go with the flow of things and sway in life, while others will fight against the currents and go upstream to reach their destiny.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: One of the secrets of life is to make stepping stones out of stumbling blocks.
quotes.author: Jack Penn

quotes.quote: Others can stop you temporarily -- you are the only one who can do it permanently.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Today is a new day. Yesterday's mistakes cannot affect today's possibilities unless you dwell on them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Lotter

quotes.quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Choose rather to be strong of soul than strong of body.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Acceptance of what has happened is the first step to overcoming the consequences of any misfortune.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Standing in the inspiring vision of my future, I boldly take every step - large and small - with courage and intent.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Let us not pray to be sheltered from dangers but to be fearless when facing them.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, "I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along." . . . You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Choose what lies in the shadows to be a matter for discovery and adventure, rather than fear.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Conquering any difficulty always gives one a secret joy, for it means pushing back a boundary-line and adding to one's liberty.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Never complain about your troubles; they are responsible for more than half of your income.
quotes.author: Robert Updegraff

quotes.quote: To solve any problem, here are three questions to ask yourself: First, what could I do? Second, what could I read? And third, who could I ask?
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: It is a good rule to face difficulties at the time they arise and not allow them to increase unacknowledged.
quotes.author: Edward W. Ziegler

quotes.quote: A very disturbing feature ofÂ overconfidenceÂ is that it often appears to be poorly associated with knowledge - that is, the more ignorant the individual, the more confident he or she might be.
quotes.author: Robert Trivers

quotes.quote: Confidence is a fine trait. Over-confidence isn't.Â
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: OverconfidenceÂ precedes carelessness.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: People exaggerate their confidence in their plans - something we call the planning fallacy... The existence of the plan tends to induce overconfidence.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Doubt is not the enemy of justice; overconfidence is.
quotes.author: Carol Tavris

quotes.quote: Arrogance really comes from insecurity, and in the end our feeling that we are bigger than others is really the flip side of our feeling that we are smaller than others.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Incompetence is certainty in the absence of expertise. Overconfidence is certainty in the presence of expertise.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Beware of over-confidence; especially in matters of structure.Â
quotes.author: Cass Gilbert

quotes.quote: OverconfidenceÂ blurs out the risk. Inferiority magnifies it.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Arrogance on the part of the meritorious is even more offensive to us than the arrogance of those without merit: for merit itself is offensive.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Arrogance is inimical to prudential reasoning, to accepting that for all we know and learn we also accumulate ignorance of the questions we do not ask, the risks we do not and cannot comprehend. In short, arrogance is what causes us to ignore our fallibilities.
quotes.author: Ziauddin Sardar

quotes.quote: A certain death of an artist is overconfidence.
quotes.author: Robin Trower

quotes.quote: To a winner, complacency and overconfidence can be destructive. To losers, desperation and despondency are just as harmful.
quotes.author: Bill Walsh

quotes.quote: Overconfidence comes from fear and doubt, and you boast an ego when you're feeling less than.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: Arrogance is the obstruction of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bion of Smyrna

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a mixture of impertinence, disobedience, indiscipline, rudeness, harshness, and a self-assertive nature.
quotes.author: Sivananda

quotes.quote: Developing self-confidence is always the preliminary to becoming a leader. but don't let it become overconfidence, the first station on the track leading to arrogance.
quotes.author: John Adair

quotes.quote: Arrogance and fanaticism cause the hardening of positions taken and entrenchment can only lead to a dead end.
quotes.author: Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew I of Constantinople

quotes.quote: OverconfidenceÂ is a powerful source of illusions, primarily determined by the quality and coherence of the story that you can construct, not by its validity.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: If arrogance is the heady wine of youth, then humility must be its eternal hangover.
quotes.author: Helen Van Slyke

quotes.quote: What begins in arrogance often ends in shame.
quotes.author: Walter Russell Mead

quotes.quote: Arrogance occurs in people who have achieved something and believe that they independently caused their own success with no assistance, support, or input from others.
quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.quote: The spirit of arrogance most definitely makes you shine. It paints a bright red target on your own forehead.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Over-confidence is as evil as undue anxiety.Â
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a killer, and wearing ambition on one's sleeve can have the same effect. There is a fine line between arrogance and self-confidence.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Can you think of any problem, in any area of human endeavor, on any scale, from microscopic to global. Whose long term solution is in any demonstrable way aided, assisted or advanced by further increases in population, locally, nationally, or globally?
quotes.author: Albert Allen Bartlett

quotes.quote: Overpopulation in various countries has become a serious threat to the health of people and a grave obstacle to any attempt to organize peace on this planet.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The humanity of men and women is inversely proportional to their numbers. A crowd is no more human than an avalanche or a whirlwind. A rabble of men and women stands lower in the scale of moral and intellectual being than a herd of Swine or of Jackals.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: We have been God like in our planned breeding of our domesticated plants and animals, but we have been rabbit like in our unplanned breeding of ourselves.
quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quotes.quote: When we can treat all existing persons as human, it will be time enough to think about having more.
quotes.author: Athelstan Spilhaus

quotes.quote: Must we wait for selection to solve the problems of overpopulation, exhaustion of resources. Pollution of the environment and a nuclear holocaust, or can we take explicit steps to make our future more secure? In the latter case, must we not transcend selection?
quotes.author: Burrhus Frederic Skinner

quotes.quote: Man begets, but land does not beget.
quotes.author: Cecil Rhodes

quotes.quote: Ozone depletion, lack of water, and pollution are not the disease they are the symptoms. The disease is overpopulation and unless we face world population head on. We are doing nothing more than sticking a Band aid on a fast growing cancerous tumor.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Cancer is nothing more than a healthy cell that starts replicating out of control.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Mankind if unchecked, functions like cancer.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: We have a finite environment the planet. Anyone who thinks that you can have infinite growth in a finite environment is either a madman or an economist.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: I believe that human overpopulation is the fundamental problem on Earth today and we humans have become a disease, the Human pox.
quotes.author: David Foreman

quotes.quote: Overpopulation is perhaps the biggest problem facing us, and immigration is part of that problem. It has to be addressed.
quotes.author: David R. Brower

quotes.quote: If we don't halt population growth with justice and compassion, it will be done for us by nature, brutally and without pity and will leave a ravaged world.
quotes.author: Dr. Henry W. Kendall

quotes.quote: Cannibalism is a radical but realistic solution to the problem of overpopulation.
quotes.author: Dr. Lyall Watson

quotes.quote: A crowded society is a restrictive society an overcrowded society becomes an authoritarian, repressive and murderous society.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: We already have the statistics for the future, the growth percentages of pollution, overpopulation, desertification. The future is already in place.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.quote: Europe is overpopulated, the world will soon be in the same condition, and if the self reproduction of man is not rationalized. We shall have war.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: The origins of the modern West are often seen in the enlightenment of the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries, but the roots of the enlightenment can be found in habits of mind cultivated in Athens, Rome, and Jerusalem, and the institutions that grew from them.
quotes.author: Ibn Warraq

quotes.quote: Democracy cannot survive overpopulation. Human dignity cannot survive it. Convenience and decency cannot survive it. As you put more and more people onto the world, the value of life not only declines, but it disappears. It doesn't matter if someone dies, the more people there are, the less one person matters.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: To bring about destruction by overcrowding, mass starvation, anarchy, the destruction of our most cherished values, there is no need to do anything. We need only do nothing except what comes naturally, and breed and how easy it is to do nothing.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Population growth is the primary source of environmental damage.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Over consumption and overpopulation underlie every environmental problem we face today.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: We must alert and organize the world's people to pressure world leaders to take specific steps to solve the two root causes of our environmental crises exploding population growth and wasteful consumption of irreplaceable resources. Over consumption and overpopulation underlie every environmental problem we face today.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: The biggest obstacle was mixing abortion with overpopulation. These are two things that have nothing to do with each other.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: It's terrible to have to say this. World population must be stabilized and to do that we must eliminate 350,000 people per day. This is so horrible to contemplate that we shouldn't even say it. But the general situation in which we are involved is lamentable.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Acknowledging the physical realities of our planet does not mean a dismal future of endless sacrifice. In fact, acknowledging these realities is the first step in dealing with them. We can meet the resource problems of the world water, food, minerals, farmlands, forests, overpopulation, pollution if we tackle them with courage and foresight.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: I am unapologetic about asking people to connect up their own responsibility for their total environmental footprint and how they decide to procreate and how many children they think are appropriate.
quotes.author: Jonathon Porritt

quotes.quote: I think we will work our way toward a position that says that having more than two children is irresponsible.
quotes.author: Jonathon Porritt

quotes.quote: Anyone who believes that exponential growth can go on forever in a finite world is either a madman or an economist.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Boulding

quotes.quote: When justice is more certain and more mild, it is at the same time more efficacious.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: The more anger towards the past you carry in your heart, the less capable you are of loving in the present.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: The excess energy released from overreaction to setbacks is what innovates!
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Somehow you were meant to take responsibility, minute to minute, for deciding which events you would call manageable, now that none of them were.
quotes.author: Chris Cleave

quotes.quote: Don't get upset with people or situations. Both are powerless without your reaction.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: She knew that nothing was ever as overwhelming or final as he seemed to think, that if he would wait, instead of shouting, there'd be less to shout over in the end.
quotes.author: Josephine Johnson

quotes.quote: This brings a threatened nation, which can react to such uncertain dangers solely through administrative channels, to the truly embarrassing situation of perhaps overreacting.
quotes.author: Jurgen Habermas

quotes.quote: When you speak up about any sense of unfairness or injustice, you're told that you're overreacting, you're too angry, too silly, shut up already. It takes a tremendous amount of fortitude to be able to live in this world as a woman, let alone a woman who wants things to change.
quotes.author: Kathleen Hanna

quotes.quote: My legs have the strength of mashed potatoes. I'm cold and clammy and my stomach churns like I vomited. That's because I did, in the viewing room, and I discovered that yellow bile does not blend well with red velvet industrial carpeting. My crowning achievement in overreaction.
quotes.author: Katie McGarry

quotes.quote: We need to break the habit of overreacting because of our speedy assumptions and judgments.
quotes.author: Kristine Carlson

quotes.quote: Every day you must unlearn the ways that hold you back. You must rid yourself of negativity, so you can learn to fly.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: Light control works; close control leads to overreaction, sometimes causing the machinery to break into pieces.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Congress does two things well: nothing and overreacting.
quotes.author: Rep. Mike Oxley

quotes.quote: The stock market is the story of cycles and of the human behavior that is responsible for overreactions in both directions.
quotes.author: Seth Klarman

quotes.quote: Deep disappointment and disillusionment repressed by the Lose/Win mentality. Disproportionate rage or anger, overreaction to minor provocation, and cynicism are other embodiment's of suppressed emotion.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: I think they should rename the place Unnecessary Violent Overreaction.
quotes.author: Tui T. Sutherland

quotes.quote: The message of the cross will always be foolishness to some, a stumbling block to others. But if our attention is on the market reaction, we move away from the power of the gospel. This fearfulness to talk about the blood of Christ is an overreaction. Worse than that, it borders on heresy, distorting and deflating the power of the Good News.
quotes.author: Jim Cymbala

quotes.quote: Anything that causes you to overreact or under react can control you, and often does
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is always full of drama and challenges, but you don't have to overreact to any of it if you choose not to.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I've heard it said that holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Communication is like a pressure relief valve for your body. When a little pressure gets cooked up inside and needs to be released, you can gently turn the nozzle and release it slowly and gracefully until you feel better, by way of a productive conversation. But if you choose to ignore the warning signals and leave that pressure inside, it's going to grow and inevitably explode and make a mess, by way of an overreaction and possibly an argument.
quotes.author: L.K. Elliott

quotes.quote: Strong feelings are fine; it's the overreactions that mess us up.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: It's never overreacting to ask for what you want and need.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Overreaction is one of the things that congress specializes in. I can't think of anything congress does better than overreact.
quotes.author: Fred Barnes

quotes.quote: Anything that causes you to overreact or underreact can control you, and often does.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: As a goaltender, I never liked to be scored on in overtime, but for this offering I don't mind seeing the red light go on.
quotes.author: Dwayne Roloson

quotes.quote: Changes in overtime working affect the firm's revenue and costs as well as union member's hourly earnings and leisure time.
quotes.author: Robert A. Hart

quotes.quote: If you go into overtime then I would rather be an actor instead of president of the company, because that's where the money is.
quotes.author: Jack Warner

quotes.quote: Shooting a film can be quite exorbitant...after eight hours, you go into overtime, golden time, and platinum time.
quotes.author: Paul Mazursky

quotes.quote: Time is money, especially overtime.
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: Visible attention paid to overtime is often sufficient to impress people with its importance so they become more careful.
quotes.author: Charles McConell

quotes.quote: Some overtime work is essential to give enterprises the flexibility to deal with unusual pressure of work, fluctuations in demand or other special circumstances.
quotes.author: International Labor Office

quotes.quote: Overtime work and long work hours may adversely alter employee's lifestyle behaviours as a result of energy and time depletion.
quotes.author: Maria C.W. Peeters

quotes.quote: It is probably better to think of long working hours and working overtime as possible indicators of high quantitative job demands, but not as defining characteristics.
quotes.author: Van Veldhoven

quotes.quote: Time worked beyond normal hours constitutes overtime or exceptions.
quotes.author: International Labor Office

quotes.quote: To win at the game of life you have to go all in. From the starter bell to the overtime, the finish line to the ultimate win has no shortcuts. You are your only limit, so go the distance.
quotes.author: Floyd Griffin

quotes.quote: When life said the game was over, God sent him in for one more play.
quotes.author: Jacob Bembry

quotes.quote: Liberals become indignant when you question their patriotism, but simultaneously work overtime to give terrorists a cushion for the next attack and laugh at dumb Americans who love their country and hate the enemy.
quotes.author: Ann Coulter

quotes.quote: A show is exhausting when it stinks. It's exhausting when you have to work overtime to make something work.
quotes.author: Pati LuPone

quotes.quote: I'll work overtime to open the doors of opportunity to industry and commerce.
quotes.author: Alan Autry

quotes.quote: In judging others, folks will work overtime for no pay.
quotes.author: Charles Edwin Carruthers

quotes.quote: To be the best you have to work overtime.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quotes.quote: We should pass a flex time law that allows employees to take their overtime pay in money or in time off, depending on what's better for their family.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: If you were willing to work, the overtime was there for you.
quotes.author: Chuck Cooper

quotes.quote: Working overtime is an underpaid man's salvation.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: It's exhausting when you have to work overtime to make something work.
quotes.author: Patti LuPone

quotes.quote: When life has gone into overtime it's easy to take liberties.
quotes.author: Jonas Jonasson

quotes.quote: An owl is traditionally a symbol of wisdom, so we are neither doves nor hawks but owls, and we are vigilant when others are resting.
quotes.author: Urjit Patel

quotes.quote: There's always a hidden owl in knowledge.
quotes.author: E.I. Jane

quotes.quote: Owl is the grand and rather clever old man of the forest. He can also spell Tuesday.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: The owl is nocturnal with keen senses of sight and sound. It sees through the shadows of the night and hears the sounds in the silense; the illusion of the darkness. This teaches us to see past our own illusions and trust our intuition and perceptive senses.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not trap yourself into an owl's hooting soundwhere sad nights linger through the blackness of a hound.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The inauspiciousness of the owl is nothing but the inauspiciousness of the man who thinks that owl is inauspicious!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If there are no nightingales, one must settle for owls.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: A wise old owl sat in an oak. The more he saw, the less he spoke. The less he spoke, the more he heard. Why can't we be like that wise old bird?
quotes.author: Edward Hersey Richards

quotes.quote: Those who drink whiskey with the owls at night, cannot soar with the eagles the next day.
quotes.author: Brian D. Ratty

quotes.quote: People say the darkness is where secrets are best hidden. Night time brings clarity and focus to owls, even if the aperture of this vision comes with a stigma.
quotes.author: Kimberly Morgan

quotes.quote: Alone and warming his five wits, the white owl in the belfry sits.
quotes.author: Alfred, Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: An owl is the wisest of all birds because the more it sees the the less it talks.
quotes.author: Christie Watson

quotes.quote: No owl is afraid of the night, no snake of the swamp and no traitor of the treason.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Owl looked at him, and wondered whether to push him off the tree; but, feeling that he could always do it afterwards, he tried once more to find out what they were talking about.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Advice from an owl: stay focused, be whoo you are, trust in a wise friend, live off the land, glide through the dark times, be observant, because life’s a hoot!
quotes.author: Ilan Shamir

quotes.quote: Observe and reflect, and become a little wiser every day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The owl goes not into the nest of the lark.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The owl, that bird of onomatopoetic name, is a repetitious question wrapped in feathery insulation especially for Winter delivery.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: There was a wise old owl who sat in a tree The less he spoke the more he heard The more he heard the less he spoke Why can't we be like that wise old owl in the tree? Speech must die to serve that which is spoken.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: Owl hasn't exactly got Brain, but he Knows Things.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: The wailing owl screams solitary to the mournful moon.
quotes.author: David Mallet

quotes.quote: A wise old owl once lived in a wood, the more he heard the less he said, the less he said the more he heard, let's emulate that wise old bird.
quotes.author: Flann O'Brien

quotes.quote: The owl of Minerva spreads its wings only with the falling of the dusk.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: More like some small, fierce bird of prey, something with a sharp bite. An owl perhaps, that speaks only when the rest of the world sleeps. Jenny will do well enough.
quotes.author: Juliet Marillier Favorite

quotes.quote: The owl is one of the most curious creatures. A bird that stays awake when the rest of the world sleeps. They can see in the dark. I find that so interesting, to be mired in reality when the rest of the world is dreaming. What does he see and what does he know that the rest of the world is missing.
quotes.author: M.J. Rose

quotes.quote: But the owls themselves are not hard to find, silent and on the wing, with their ear tufts flat against their heads as they fly and their huge wings alternately gliding and flapping as they maneuver through the trees. Athena's owl of wisdom and Merlin's companion, Archimedes, were screech owls surely, not this bird with the glassy gaze, restless on the bough, nothing but blood on its mind.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Owls are wise. They are careful and patient. Wisdom precludes boldness. That is why owls make poor heroes.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: The little owls call to each other with tremulous, quavering voices throughout the livelong night, as they sit in the creaking trees.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The crow wished everything was black, the Owl, that everything was white.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The clamorous owl that nightly hoots and wonders At our quaint spirits.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: By becoming self-aware, you gain ownership of reality; in becoming real, you become the master of both inner and outer life.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: To think about your life is to create it. You have to take ownership of where you are right now and know where you want to go before you can get there. Keep collecting evidence for your success. You can believe it, and you can be it.
quotes.author: Ali Vincent

quotes.quote: Do your thing. Do it unapologetically. Don't be discouraged by criticism. You probably already know what they're going to say. Pay no mind to the fear of failure. It's far more valuable than success. Take ownership, take chances, and have fun. And no matter what, don't ever stop doing your thing.
quotes.author: Asher Roth

quotes.quote: When you love something, you get to know it. Then you feel the ownership and if it changes, you only love it as far as you know it because then you're like, "What is this?"
quotes.author: Kristen Stewart

quotes.quote: What you resist, persists. If you take ownership and deal with things that are bothering you, then, in the very process of dealing with them they very often will go away.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ownership and control is important, because if you don't own what you do, all sorts of stupid stuff happens to it, and people spend good money on garbage.
quotes.author: Kevin Shields

quotes.quote: Ownership is not a vice, not something to be ashamed of, but rather a commitment, and an instrument by which the general good can be served.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Ownership, that's what you give your kids. That's your legacy.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: From beginning to end, Scripture repeatedly emphasizes God's ownership of everything: "To the Lord your God belong the heavens, even the highest heavens, the earth and everything in it" .When I grasp that I'm a steward, not an owner, it totally changes my perspective.
quotes.author: Randy Alcorn

quotes.quote: When people take greater ownership of their own health care and are encouraged to do that in a health plan, their health gets better. They pursue more wellness opportunities.
quotes.author: Mike Pence

quotes.quote: True ownership of anything requires time.
quotes.author: Barbara Holland

quotes.quote: The sense of ownership is one reason why abuse tends to get worse as relationships get more serious. The more history and commitment that develop in the couple, the more the abuser comes to think of his partner as a prized object. Possessiveness is at the core of the abuser's mindset, the spring from which all the other streams spout; on some level he feels that he owns you and therefore has the right to treat you as he sees fit.
quotes.author: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.quote: Love does not cause suffering: what causes it is the sense of ownership, which is love's opposite.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The heart of a grass-roots campaign is the ownership.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.quote: When theres no sense of possessiveness or ownership in the artistic process, great things happen.
quotes.author: Paul Budnitz

quotes.quote: Possessing by letting go of things was a secret of ownership unknown to youth.
quotes.author: Yukio Mishima

quotes.quote: Freeing yourself was one thing; claiming ownership of that freed self was another.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Worker ownership is only one form of democratizing ownership.
quotes.author: Gar Alperovitz

quotes.quote: There is no such thing, as far as I'm concerned, as ownership in love.
quotes.author: Max Frisch

quotes.quote: Liking is probably the best form of ownership, and ownership the worst form of liking.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: The instinct of ownership is fundamental in man's nature.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Every man has a property in his own person. This nobody has a right to, but himself.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: I learned that you can't truly own anything, that true ownership comes only in the moment of giving.
quotes.author: Mia Farrow

quotes.quote: Everything changes for the better when you take ownership of your own problems.
quotes.author: Robert Ringer

quotes.quote: Taking ownership of your happiness has two aspects: Accepting that being happy is up to you and that you have the ability and power to be happier by changing your habits. Taking "response-ability": responding to all the events in your life in a way that supports your happiness.
quotes.author: Marci Shimoff

quotes.quote: Ownership has been separated from control; and this separation has removed many of the checks which formerly operated to curb the misuse of wealth and power.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Until you take ownership for your life, you will always be chasing happiness.
quotes.author: Sean Stephenson

quotes.quote: There can be to the ownership of anything no rightful title which is not derived from the title of the producer and does not rest upon the natural right of the man to himself.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: You have to take ownership and leadership of tomorrow. For that to be possible, you have to strengthen your capacity and widen your vision as a global citizen.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: Love is ownership. We own whom we love. The universe is God's because He loves.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Always and never are two words you should always remember never to use.
quotes.author: Wendell Johnson

quotes.quote: The first condition of immortality is death.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: Correct thinkers think that 'baseball trivia' is an oxymoron: nothing about baseball is trivial.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: Time management is an oxymoron. Time is beyond our control, and the clock keeps ticking regardless of how we lead our lives. Priority management is the answer to maximizing the time we have.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: We learn from history that man can never learn anything from history.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: The good oxymoron, to define it by a self-illustration, must be a planned inadvertency.
quotes.author: Wilson Follett

quotes.quote: Oxymoron: When an astronaut feels under the weather.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Women have to harness their power - its absolutely true. It's just learning not to take the first no. And if you can't go straight ahead, you go around the corner.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: The best that we can do is to be kindly and helpful toward our friends and fellow passengers who are clinging to the same speck of dirt while we are drifting side by side to our common doom.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: From the equality of rights springs identity of our highest interests; you cannot subvert your neighbor's rights without striking a dangerous blow at your own.
quotes.author: Carl Schurz

quotes.quote: Spare no expense to save money on this one.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Always live within your income, even if you have to borrow money to do so.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: A lot of people never use their initiative because no-one told them to.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Don't worry about the war. It's all over but the shooting.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Listen! Clam up your mouth and be silent like an oyster shell, for that tongue of yours is the enemy of the soul, my friend. When the lips are silent, the heart has a hundred tongues.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The first man gets the oyster, the second man gets the shell.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The world was my oyster but I used the wrong fork.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We are bound to our bodies like an oyster to its shell.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: What strikes the oyster shell doesn't damage the pearl.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The world is your oyster. Yes, but in that oyster is the pearl; and to get to the pearl one has to first discard the shell and the flesh.
quotes.author: Ian Gardner

quotes.quote: I had rather be an oyster than a man, the most stupid and senseless of animals.
quotes.author: George Berkeley

quotes.quote: The world is an oyster, but you don't crack it open on a mattress.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: There is no irritant as painful as an ace up your sleeve that you can never use; it's the kind of thing that causes oysters to produce pearls.
quotes.author: Sheila Ballantyne

quotes.quote: Minds are like oysters. They spoil if you pry them open.
quotes.author: Willa Gibbs

quotes.quote: It is, after all, the dab of grit that seeps into an oyster’s shell that makes the pearl, not pearl-making seminars with other oysters.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The world is your oyster. It's up to you to find the pearls.
quotes.author: Chris Gardner

quotes.quote: The life of man is of no greater importance to the universe than that of an oyster.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: You speculate on the luxury of wearing out a whole existence in bed, like an oyster in its shell, content with the sluggish ecstasy of inaction.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Contentment is not happiness. An oyster may be contented. Happiness is compounded of richer elements.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: For memory, we use our imagination. We take a few strands of real time and carry them with us, then like an oyster we create a pearl around them.
quotes.author: John Banville

quotes.quote: Wisdom is a pearl whose oyster is truth.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: So many pearls to be had, if you were in the mood to open oysters.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Sand irritates the oyster and the oyster responds by becoming a beautiful pearl. Allow difficulties to serve your transformation in the blossoming consciousness that you are.
quotes.author: Anonymous
